Он привык трудиться один, и помогать другим. Рачабали запрашивает кредит для купли несколько скотов. Он хочет увеличить поголовье скота и расширить животноводческую деятельность. Рачабали ждет поддержку с Вашей стороны.
texts.en:
Rajabali is a 26-year-old business man.  He is in the cattle business.  He has a barn and all the necessities for raising cattle.  Rajabali has been in this business for five years.  He buys young calves, feeds and fattens them for 40-60 days and then sells them at the cattle market.  Rajabali is unmarried and lives with his parents in Vahdat.  He is accustomed to working alone and to help others.

Rajabali is requesting a loan to buy several head of cattle.  He wants to increase the size of his herd so as to expand his business.  He is hopeful for your support.

loans.use: to buy several head of cattle and expand his cattle business

loans.name: Mirzobek

texts.ru: Мирзобек трудолюбивый мужчина и заботливый отец шестерых детей. Ему 54 года и к сожалению воспитывает он своих детей один. Но, не смотря на это Мирзобек смог достойно воспитать своих детей. Старшие сыновья находятся в трудовой миграции в России, дочерей он выдал замуж. Мирзобек вот уже 10 лет занимается разведением скота. От этой деятельности он имеет не плохой доход. И Мирзобек не намерен останавливаться на этом, и хочет расширить свой бизнес за счет увеличения поголовья своих животных.  Мирзобек обратился для получения кредита на покупку животных. Он надеется на Ваше понимание и обещает во время выплачивать кредит.
texts.en:
Mirzobek is a hardworking man and a caring father of six children.  He is 54 years old and, unfortunately, raised his children by himself.  In spite of this, Mirzobek was able to raise them commendably.  His eldest sons are migrant laborers in Russia and his daughters are all married.

Mirzobek has been in the cattle business for 10 years and it brings him a decent income.  However, he doesn't want to rest on his laurels.  He wants to expand his business by increasing the size of his herd.  Mirzobek has applied for a loan to buy cattle.  He is relying on your understanding and promises to repay the loan on time.

loans.use: to purchase livestock and expand his business

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
From Kabankalan City, Negros Occidental, here is Grace, a wholesaler of clothes and umbrellas. She is married to Edwin and they have children. Edwin is not just her companion in life but also her business buddy. Together, they toil hard in order to uplift their business.

As a wholesaler, Grace obtains bundles of clothes such as jeans, slacks, shirts, skirts, dresses, undies, hankies, jogging pants, uniforms and jackets. She’s also a dealer of different umbrellas. Her husband delivers these items to their contact retailers with the use of their mini truck. They also pay two helper-vendors stationed in two different posts.

But like other businesses, there are lean seasons and peak seasons for their business. They also suffer from huge collectibles and lack of capital, and they have been adjusting from time to time. Fortunately, this Christmas season is a peak season for this kind of business. This is why Grace wants to avail of PHP 50,000 loan that she will use as supplementary capital. She will buy loads and bundles of clothing that she can distribute to retailers. It will surely boost her income and savings.

Grace dreams for a successful business that she can bestow to her children someday. She also dreams that they would finish their college degrees so they would have favorable options in life. 

She is a compliant member of CCT Credit Cooperative and meets with her co-fellowship* members every week to inspire and strengthen each other through the Word of God. 

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to buy loads and bundles of clothing that she can distribute to retailers.

loans.name: Kavgimo

texts.ru: Эту рукодельницу зовут Кавгимо. Ей 50 лет. Она мать 5 детей. Детям 26, 25, 22, 9 и 7 лет. Мужу 55 лет. Ее муж и старший сын занимается мастером по ремонту домов. Дочка работает уборщицей в больнице. Сама Кавгимо занимается швейной деятельностью. Она с молодостью шьет национальное таджикское платье. В округе ее знают как талантливую рукодельницу. По ее словам ей клиентам нравится ее изделия.  Поэтому у Кавгимо каждый день увеличиться количество клиентов. Кавгимо желает, что бы ее мастерство приносило клиентом радость и хорошее настроение.  Она хочет ускорить процесс своей работы, чтобы не потерять клиентов и источник дохода. Ее старая машинка устарела, и Кавгимо на старой машинке шила много лет. Она хочет приобрести новую электронную швейную машинку, чтобы сшить быстро и красиво. С такими планами Кавгимо обратилась за кредитом.
texts.en:
This is a seamstress named Kavgimo.  She is 50 years old and has five children aged 26, 25, 22, 9, and 7.  Her husband is 55 years old.  Kavgimo's husband and eldest son are construction craftsmen.  Her daughter works as a hospital janitor.  Kavgimo is in the sewing business.  Since her childhood, she has been sewing traditional Tajik dresses.  She is well known in her region for being a talented seamstress.  She says that her client base grows daily because people like her work.  Kavgimo likes it when her talents bring her clients joy and happiness.

Kavgimo wants to speed up her work so that she doesn't lose clients and their orders.  She has sewn on her old machine for many years, but it is worn out.  She would like to buy a new electronic sewing machine so that she can sew quickly and beautifully.  It is with these plans that Kavgimo has applied for a loan.

loans.use: to buy a new electronic sewing machine

loans.name: Kholmumin

texts.ru: Холмумин житель района Носири Хусрав. Ему 42 года он женат и имеет 2 детей. Холмумин вот уже 6 лет как занимается растениеводством. Основная его деятельность это выращивание пшеницы. Холмумин очень гордится своей работой, так как она обеспечивает его семью всем необходимым. Однако в этом году из-за сложного финансового положения, Холмумин не смог приобрести минеральные удобрения и семена для посадки пшеницы.  Единственным выходом он увидел в получении кредита. И по этому он обратился за кредитом, чтобы  смог приобрести семена для посадки пшеницы. Таким образом, он надеется получить хороший урожай и вовремя погасить кредит.
texts.en: Kholmunin is a resident of the Nosiri Khusrav region.  He is 42 years old, married, and has two children.  He has been in the farming business for six years.  His primary crop is wheat.  Kholmunin takes great pride in his work because it provide his family with all the necessities.  However, because of financial difficulties, this year Kholmunin was not able to buy wheat seed and mineral fertilizers.  Taking out a loan was the only solution that Kholmunin could find.  And so, he has applied for a loan so he can plant wheat.  He is hoping for a good harvest and to repay the loan on time.

loans.use: to purchase wheat seed and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Maria Fernanda

texts.es:
Maria Fernanada tiene 25 años edad vive con sus padres en la Provincia de los Rios con sus Padres, es soltera

Maria trabaja en la agricultura en la siembra de Maiz, comenta que el credito va hacer invertido para la compra de semilla para la siembra de maiz.

A futuro ella piensa en comprar un terreno propio para sembrar.

E sus tiempos libres ella pasa en casa ayudando a sus padres.
texts.en:
Maria Fernanda is 25 years old. She lives with her parents in the Province of Los Rios, and she is single. Maria works in agriculture in the planting of corn. 
She says that the loan will be invested in the purchase of seeds for corn planting. In the future, Maria is thinking of purchasing her own land for planting. In her free time, she spends time at home helping her parents.

loans.use: to purchase seeds.

loans.name: Ra'nogul

texts.ru: Раъногул из района Муминобод. Она занимается портнихой. Раъногул шьет национальное женское платье. Этому она научилась у своей мамы, которая говорила дочери, что женщина должна владеть ремеслом и помогать мужчинам поддерживать семью. В детстве Раъногул начала кроить и шить самостоятельно. Сегодня ее изделия пользуется немалым спросом среди жителей района, особенно среди невест. Раъногул хочет приобрести многофункциональную швейную машинку, чтобы улучшить и расширить деятельность. Для завершения данной операции ей нужно определенная сумма денег. Раъногул ждет поддержку с Вашей стороны.
texts.en:
Ra'nogul is from the Muminobod region.  She is a seamstress and makes traditional women's clothing.  Ra'nogul has known how to sew since childhood.  She learned from her mother, who told her daughters that a woman should know a trade and help her husband support the family.  Today, Ra'nogul's work is in demand by the residents of her region, especially brides.

Ra'nogul would like to buy a multifunction sewing machine so that she can improve and expand her business.  She needs a certain amount of money to be able to do this.  Ra'nogul is relying on your support..

loans.use: to buy a multifunction sewing machine

loans.name: Abduhakim

texts.ru:
Абдухакиму 41 год. Он женат и имеет троих детей. С ними также живет его пожилая мама. Абдулхамик заботиться о матери. Он обеспечивает семью своим животноводческим бизнесом. В его ферме всего 2 коровы. Он прости кредит, чтобы купить еще 2 теленка. Абдулкахим планирует вырасти своих коров и продавать молоко 
Мало-помалу он расширить свою ферму.
texts.en: Abduhakim is 41 years old.  He is married and has three children.  He also takes care of his elderly mother who lives with them.  Abduhakim provides for his family by owning a cattle business.  He has a total of two cows on his farm.  He is requesting a loan in order to buy two more calves.  Abduhakim plans to raise them and sell their milk.  Little by little, he is expanding his business.

loans.use: to buy two calves and expand his small farm

loans.name: Mohira

texts.ru: 21 летняя рукодельница Мохира. Она жительница района Муминобод. Мохира живет вместе с отцом, матерью, сестрой, братом, снохой и внуками. Мохира воспитанная и самостоятельная девушка. Она работает учительницей в школе. Она после школе у себя дома занимается шитьем женской  одежды на заказ. Считается, что швейной мастерицей может стать не каждая девушка или женщина. Для этого необходимо иметь талант, как, впрочем, и в любом другом деле. Мохира хочет поменять нынешнюю швейную машинку, по причине, что она долго лет служила и уже хорошо не выполняет свои функции.  Мохира за счет кредита купить многофункциональную машинку.
texts.en:
This is Mohira.  She is a 21-year-old seamstress who lives in the Muminobod region.  She lives with her father, mother, sister, brother, sister-in-law, and grandchildren.  Mohira is a ladylike and independent young woman.  She works as a school teacher, but after school she works from home making custom women's clothing.  Mohira believes that not just any girl or woman can become a seamstress.  One needs talent for it, just like with any other trade.

Mohira wants to get a new sewing machine because the one she has now is old and no longer performs all its functions well.  Mohira will use the loan to buy a multifunction sewing machine.

loans.use: to buy a multifunction sewing machine

loans.name: Jefferson

texts.es:
Jefferson es un joven estudiante de Mecánica de Mantenimiento, carrera que eligió porque le gusta todo lo relacionado a la mecánica, como reparar objetos, lo cual hacía desde muy pequeño y ahora que se le presentó la oportunidad de estudiar lo hace con mucho empeño y dedicación. 

Le va muy bien en sus estudios. Aún le faltan 2 años para culminar su carrera y cumplir su sueño anhelado, que es ser una persona desarrollada profesional y moralmente, con una familia estable y ser tan feliz que contagie mi felicidad a mis hermanos y familiares. Cuando culmine su carrera, piensa trabajar en grandes empresas que le permita especializarse cada vez más. En sus tiempos libres desea seguir la carrera de Ingeniero Mecánico.

Su familia está pasando por una situación económica difícil, lo que pone en riesgo su continuidad estudiantil. Es por tal motivo que Jefferson, recurre a KIVA para solicitar este crédito que le permita seguir con sus estudios y así poder apoyar a su familia que tanto hicieron por él durante el tiempo de sus estudios, logrando en él mayor madurez y responsabilidad, sintiéndose capaz de todo.

Jefferson, desea expresarles unas líneas a los inversionistas: "Gracias a personas como ustedes, siento una responsabilidad de mejorar y acabar la carrera. Muchísimas gracias por brindarme su apoyo y confianza sobre mis hombros, no pienso defraudarlos jamás. Si me lo permiten, algún día, me gustaría formar parte del gran grupo humano que son ustedes para apoyar a los chicos que como yo están con todas las ganas de superarse y ser grandes profesionales de éxitos."
texts.en:
Jefferson is a young Mechanical Maintenance student. He chose this course because he likes everything to do with mechanics, including repairing items. This is what he has been doing since he was very little and now that he has been presented with the opportunity to study he does so with a lot of dedication and effort.

Jefferson is going very well with his studies, though he still has two years to go before he finishes his course and fulfills his long awaited dream, which is to be a person who is developed both morally and professionally with a stable family and to be so happy that his happiness is contagious and spreads to his siblings and relatives. When he finishes his course, Jefferson is thinking about working for big companies which will allow him to specialise even further and in his free time he would like to study Mechanical Engineering.

Jefferson's family are going through a difficult period financially, which puts his continued studies at risk. This is the reason why Jefferson has come to Kiva to apply for a loan which will allow him to continue with his course and support his family who have done so much for him during his studies, so that he can develop greater maturity and responsibility and feel capable of anything.

Jefferson would like to say a few words to the lenders:

"Thanks to people like you, I feel a responsibility to improve and complete my course. Thank you so much for offering me your support and for your confidence in me. I will never let you down. If I can, one day I would like to join a great group of people - that's you - to support kids like me who have every hope of improving themselves and becoming great successful professionals".

loans.use: to continue his Mechanical Maintenance studies and go on to be an excellent professional

loans.name: Menwa

texts.en:
Menwa is a 61-year-old widow. When her husband died many years ago she became very sad and desperate and she felt lonely. After that, she realized that she was responsible for one child who needed to live a comfortable life, and therefore she started her own business, which is a grocery.

She has financial constraints and cannot provide her store with food supplies and products. In order to buy new products and new food supplies such as soft drinks, candy, chips, and more, Menwa has requested a loan.

She has worked hard to bring her life to the level it is at today and wants to continue to strive to make her life with her son even better.

loans.use: to buy new products and new food supplies such as soft drinks, candy, chips, and more.

loans.name: Shamim's Group

texts.en:
Shamim is a 60-year-old married woman. She is devoted to her son, who is earning a very low income. Her son provides shuttering services for under construction houses. Most of the work depends upon getting a contract and most of the time he is unable to get any contract for generating money.

Recently, her son has gotten a huge contract, but he does not have enough shuttering material to provide proper services.

Shamim has requested a loan so that her son would be able to buy more material such as bamboos and wooden planks to provide his best services.
Shamim is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan. She is hopeful that the Kiva lenders will take pity on her and support her in the form of fund raising.

loans.use: to buy shuttering material such as bamboo and wooden planks for her son's shuttering services for under construction houses.

loans.name: Igbolidin

texts.ru: Игболидину 25 лет. Он молодой отец и начинающий предпринимателей. Игболидин честный ответственный и энергичный мужчина. Он запускает новый бизнес в сфере общественного питания. В его ассортимент товаров будет входить хот доги, гамбургеры,  шаурма и различные газировки. Игболидин все просчитал. Он нашел помещение, купил оборудование и посуду. Ему только остается купить продукты питания для изготовления своих блюд. Чтобы купить продукты Игболидину нужны средства, и он надеется решить эту проблему получив кредит. Верим, что эту джентльмену способствует удача!
texts.en:
Igbolidin is 25 years old.  He is a young father and new business man.  He is an honest, responsible, and energetic man.  He is starting a new restaurant business.  He will be selling hot dogs, hamburgers, shawarma, and various soft drinks. Igbolidin has taken everything into account.  He has found a location, and has purchased equipment and dishware.  All that's left is for him to buy food products to prepare his menu items.

In order to buy the food products, Igbolidin needs funding and he hopes to solve this problem by taking out a loan.  We believe that good fortune will also help this gentleman.

loans.use: to buy food products to start a new business

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad, 49, is a married father of six. He is also a Palestinian refugee who started working in the construction field 33 years ago, specializing in pasting tiles, to cover his family's living needs and expenses.

In 1982, he started his own business, working hard to develop it in a well managed way to make sure that he can meet his family's increasing living needs.

Today, Mohammad is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to buy a car necessary for his construction business facilitation, expansion and development.

With this loan, Mohammad can easily commit to several projects at one time and is sure that he can finish them on time.

He hopes to stay capable of expanding his business more in the future to increase his income and improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a car necessary for his construction business facilitation, expansion and  development.

loans.name: Wafaa

texts.en:
Wafaa is a 49-year-old married mother of three. Twelve years ago, she opened a grocery shop to help her husband in covering the needs and expenses of their children. She is hard worker who is well-known among her region. She is trying hard to develop her business, thus today she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to increase and diversify her merchandise with new items to satisfy her customers' demands.
Wafaa hopes to expand her business more in the future to increase her income and stay capable of satisfying her children's needs.

loans.use: to increase and diversify her merchandise with new items to satisfy her customers' demands

loans.name: Zeinab

texts.en:
Zeinab is a 54-year-old married mother of four children who has been running her convenience store for fourteen years. She is a hard worker who is helping her husband in covering the needs and expenses of their children. 

Zeinab is trying desperately to develop her business, thus today she is acquiring a loan from Kiva partner, Al Majmoua, to increase her merchandise with special requested items and offer products that will increase her income and meet her customers' needs. 

Zeinab hopes that one day she'll be capable of starting wholesale trade which will improve her family's socioeconomic situation.

loans.use: to increase her merchandise with special requested items and offer products.

loans.name: Phú

texts.en:
Mr Phú is 33 years old and he is married.

He has worked in agriculture, raising poultry, for more than three years.

Phú lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. His household was recognized by local government as poor, moreover the market need is low in this region. He has no collateral, so he can't get a loan from other banks or credit institutions.

His family has no latrine. He is concerned that this is not hygienic. He is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet.

This is Phú's first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

loans.use: to build a toilet.

loans.name: Ruman

texts.en:
Ruman is an amazing mother who lives in small village near Tulkarem. She has three children and she is working hard to ensure a good life for them and ensure that they do not need anything.

Ruman's husband works as employee, but he can not cover all the needs for his big family. She wants to help him in any way she can, and because she is a very productive and ambitious woman, she decided to open her own business.

Ruman started her business five years ago. She sews clothes to sell. After she felt that she had a good experience in this business, she decided to expand and develop her work. Therefore she applied for a loan to help her buy a new sewing machine and fabrics to increase her income. She needs your support to achieve her dreams.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine and fabrics to increase her income.

loans.name: Salomat

texts.en: Salomat is a resident of the region of Shahrituz. She is a very kind and caring woman. Salomat has been growing crops for 30 years now. Salomat plants the crops herself, looks after the grain and vegetable seedlings, gathers the harvest, sells it, and also uses it as food for her own family. Thanks to her hard work, her family does not want for anything. Salomat has already planted her new crop, but she did not have enough money to buy mineral fertilizers. She has applied for a loan with high hopes, and believes that she will be supported so that her family will not be left without food.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Sandy Yamileth

texts.es: Sandy es una mujer trabajadora que se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza por catálogo, además se apoya en su venta de joyería de enchape, obteniendo mejores ingresos económicos, para sostener a su familia. Ella a sus 24 años de edad cuenta con vivienda propia en la que vive junto a su grupo familiar. Sandy desea mejorar su vivienda cada día, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo y hierro para construir un muro perimetral en su vivienda, que le permita contar con mayor seguridad.
texts.en:
Sandy is a very hard-working woman who sells beauty products through catalog. She also sells plated jewelry, which provides her with better earnings to support her family.

With only 24 years of age, she already owns the house where she lives with her family. Sandy wants to make some home improvements. That is why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy cement, sand, gravel, bricks and iron to build a perimeter fence around her home for more security.

loans.use: buy cement, gravel, bricks and iron to build a perimeter fence around her home for more security.

loans.name: Maximina

texts.en:
Maximina is 64 years old, married and has seven children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Maximina has a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for eight years and sells a variety of items such as canned good, soap, spices and other groceries.

Maximina requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy additional stocks of groceries to sell.

In the future, Maximina would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Christin

texts.en:
Christin is a married mother of four children, all of whom attend school. She lives at her own house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food. For the past ten years, she has operated a clothes selling business, selling from door to door to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of high costs of transportation. She dreams of expanding and establishing a boutique business in the future. 
With the loan of Kes 30,000 that she is requesting, she wants to purchase bales of clothes for resale. She decided to join Yehu in order to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bales of clothes for resale

loans.name: Sabah

texts.en:
Sabah is a married woman and has four children. She is selling kitchen and household supplies. She is also making cleaning materials and sells it. 
Sabah wants to help her husband in the household expenses and she is working hard to provide good education for her kids. Therefore, she is thinking to expand her business and increase her incomes. Sabah decided to apply for loan and boost her business. She wants to purchase supplies of soaps, shampoo and new materials to make cleaning products as well as to buy more kitchen supplies for resale and thus improving her standards of living. She is very grateful to Kiva for the support.

loans.use: to purchase supplies of soaps, shampoo and new materials to make cleaning products and also to buy more kitchen supplies for resale

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce  is a married mother of four children, all of whom attend school. She lives in her own house that has electricity but no piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food.

For the past five years, she has operated a clothes selling business, selling from door to door to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge in the high cost of transportation. She dreams of expanding and establishing a boutique business in the future. 

With the loan that she is requesting of Kes 20,000 she wants to purchase a stock of new clothes for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of new clothes for resale.

loans.name: María Herminia

texts.es:
María  de 71   años de edad, estudió hasta tercer grado de nivel académico no siguió estudiando por problemas económicos de la familia, está casada, su esposo se dedica a la agricultura pero por el momento no hace trabajos ya que está enfermo, actualmente maría vive con tres hijos y el esposo por lo tanto solo ellos dependen de ella.


 María, se dedica a la agricultura desde que tenia 12 años de edad, su padre la  llevaba a la milpa y fue así que aprendió ese oficio, hoy en día no se le dificulta ese trabajo por la edad pero su hijo  le ayuda a trabajar la tierra, ella se levanta a las 5:00 am para dirigirse a trabajar y termina a las 10:00 am. 


María  necesita el crédito para pagar a dos personas que le ayuden a ella y al hijo para sacar los cultivos ya que tiene 7000 metros cultivados de frijol y si se deja mas tiempo se les arruinará y será perjudicial para su bolsillo, esto el crédito le ayudará mucho porque así sacara su cultivo y obtendrá mas ganancias.


Los sueños que tiene María es poder seguir trabajando junto a su hijo y ayudarle al esposo que está enfermo.
texts.en:
María is 71 years old. She studied until third grade but could not continue studying because of family financial problems. She is married. Her husband works in agriculture but for the moment does not have work as he is ill. Mary currently lives with her three children and her husband and they depend on her only.

María has been working in agriculture since she was 12 years old. Her father took her to the cornfield and that is how she learned the trade. It is not difficult today to do that work, for her age, as her son helps her to work the land. She gets up at 5:00am to go to work and finishes at 10:00am.

María needs a loan to pay two people to help her and her son harvest as she already has 7000 cultivated meters of beans and if she leaves it longer they will be ruined and it will damage her earnings. This loan will help her very much because she can harvest her crop and obtain more profits.

María’s dreams are to be able to continue working with her son and to support her husband who is ill.

loans.use: to pay for two workers to help her and her son harvest crops as she already has 7000 metres of cultivated beans.

loans.name: Nargis

texts.ru: Наргис, трудолюбивая хорошая молодая женщина в возрасте 26 лет, разведена, имеет одного сына. К сожалению ее первый брак был неудачным, они с мужем  не  сошлись  характерами. И после долгих лет не счастья она решилась на развод и ребёнка оставила себе. После развода она пообещала себе что должна сделать так чтобы её сын рос счастливым, и не нуждался не в чём. Она  работает в средней школе учительницей, но  зарплата учителя слишком малая и ей приходится подрабатывать швеёй. Но она не жалуется на жизнь, она благодарна богу за все а главное за своего ребенка. Сейчас Наргис учится в Университете на втором курсе, она хочет получит высшее образование  но у неё не хватает денежных средств, чтобы оплатить за учёбу. И она обратилась в Арванд за кредитом и заранее благодарна за поддержку!!!
texts.en:
Nargis is a hard working young woman.  She is 26 years old, divorced, and has a son.  Unfortunately, her first marriage wasn't successful because her and her husband's characters were too different.  After many years of unhappiness, she decided to divorce and to take care of her son.  Once divorced, she promised herself that she must do everything so that her son grows up happy and he has everything he needs.

Nargis is a teacher in a secondary school, but her salary is too small and she has to supplement her income working as a seamstress.  But she doesn't complain.  She is grateful to God for everything, especially her son. 

Nargis is currently a second year student at the university.  She wants to receive a higher education, but she doesn't have the financial means to pay her tuition.  She has applied to MDO Arvand, LLC for a loan and is grateful in advance for the support!!!

loans.use: to pay tuition

loans.name: Fidrit

texts.en: Fidrit's motorcycle broke down again and he needs to make repairs to it. Kindly note that according to our national poverty level, he is very poor. His annual gross earning from his activity of motorcycle transportation is roughly $3200 and his annual expenses about $1000, leaving him with a net income of $2200.

loans.use: to repair the little motorcycle/truck (locally called motorcar) he uses to make a living.

loans.name: Frigeline

texts.en:
Frigeline is a resident of Tubigon, Bohol. She is 46 years old and is married with four children, three adults and a six-year-old child whom she wants to raise well. She wants to give them a good life.

Frigeline operates a small restaurant known as “carenderia”. She is good at cooking so she managed to start this small restaurant business. This is the reason why she is asking for a loan. She needs additional capital to buy food ingredients such as meat, vegetables, spices, and cooking oil.

In the future, Frigeline dreams of improving this business for sustainability.

loans.use: to buy food ingredients such as meat, vegetables, spices, and cooking oil.

loans.name: Auderico

texts.es:
Auderico con 34 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente,vive junto a su cónyuge y sus tres hijos, en el distrito de Callayuc,provincia de Cutervo,departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú. El cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a la agricultura,especificamente al cultivo de café, con una experiencia en el rubro de más de 10 años.Solicita préstamo para invertir en las diferentes labores agrícolas de su cultivo de café, en la compra de abonos para proporcionar en su cultivo. De esta manera logrará incrementar el rendimiento de su finca y obtener mayores ingresos.

Auderico es socio recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa. Ha manejado dos créditos los cuáles los a cancelado de manera puntual.
texts.en:
Auderico is 34 years old and lives with his partner and their 3 children. They live in the district of Callayuc, province of Cutervo, department of Cajamarca, in Peru. He has very good references, both personal and employment, from the inhabitants of the area. The inhabitants of this town work mostly in agriculture, commerce, and livestock.
Auderico works in agriculture, specifically in the cultivation of coffee. He has more than 10 years of experience in this area. He is asking for a loan to invest in the different agricultural work of his coffee crop and in the purchase of manure to supply his crop. With this he will be able to increase his farm's yields and obtain greater income.
Auderico is a recurring member for Edpyme Alternativa. He has managed two loans which were paid off in a timely manner.

loans.use: to invest in the different agricultural work of his coffee crop and in the purchase of manure to supply his crop.

loans.name: Geraldine

texts.en:
Geraldine is 32 years old, married with one child who is in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur.

Geraldine has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 16,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more seafood to sell.

Geraldine has been in this business for four years. In the future, Geraldine would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy more seafood to sell.

loans.name: Viuline

texts.en: Viuline is a married mother of four children, all of whom attend school. She lives at her own house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food. For the past ten years, she has operated a clothes selling business, selling from door to door to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of high cost of transportation. With the loan of Kes 50,000 that she is requesting, she wants to purchase bales of clothes for resale. She decided to join Yehu in order to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bales of clothes for resale

loans.name: Zaree Noreen

texts.en:
Zaree Noreen is 38 years old and lives in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She is the mother of three children; all three of them sit idle at home.

Her husband has been running a restaurant for many years and handling the financial condition of his house. This restaurant has been supporting his whole family for many years. Nowadays, he wants to offer more menu choices to his valuable customers, so that he can grow his income.

Zaree Noreen is requesting a loan for the restaurant establishment. In fact, her husband wants to buy chicken, beef, pulses, bread, butter, yogurt, etc. She is hopeful that this loan would generate more profit and savings, as well. She thanks Kiva and its field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy chicken, beef, pulses (lentils), bread, butter, and yogurt for her husband's restaurant so he can expand his menu.

loans.name: La Primera Iii Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LA PRIMERA III” iniciará el cuarto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal Villa Tejada, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Julia es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de manta, venta de ropa, venta de comida, venta de material de limpieza al por mayor, venta de dulces.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Julia es integrante, ella indica que hace cuatro ciclos que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una promoción de la institución que se realizó en su zona. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio venta de mantas; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió de su mamá y lo decidió implementar hace cinco años. 

El crédito que ahora sacará será para el aumento de capital (compra de mantas por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras de la ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente lo comercializara en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es soltera y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud y las capacitaciones que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The “La Primera III” is starting their fourth loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Villa Tejada regional office. The group is comprised of eight members, and managed by a board of directors where Julia is president. The members of the group are engaged in varied business activities including the sales of blankets, clothing, food, wholesale cleaning supplies, and candy.

The loan they are taking out will benefit small businesses where Julia is a member. She says that she has been involved with Pro Mujer for four loan cycles, and was invited to join during a promotion the institution held in her area. Currently, she has a business selling blankets, and she says that she learned this business from her mother, and decided to launch it five years ago.

The current loan will be used to increase capital through the purchase of wholesale blankets, which she will acquire from the vendors in La Paz, and later sell at her sales stand. This type of work allows her to generate income to support her family as she is single with a child.

When asked what she liked about Pro Mujer, she replied that she like the health benefits, and the training offered by the institution.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale blankets.

loans.name: Esperanza Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ESPERANZA” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal Santiago II, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Martha es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de jugo de maca, venta de ropa, venta de verduras, tienda de barrio, venta de aguayos. 

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Martha es integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando  por la invitación de una amiga que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio venta de jugo de maca; da a conocer que este negocio lo inicio con el apoyo de su familia hace seis años. 

El crédito que ahora sacará será para el aumento de capital (compra de maca por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente a la elaboración, lo venderá en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es casada y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
A.C. “ESPERANZA” will start its first cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Centro Focal Santiago II. The group is comprised of eight members and it's lead by a board of directors with Martha as the president. The businesses of the members of this communal bank are diverse, such as maca (a root vegetable native to the Andean regions of Peru and Bolivia) juice sales, clothes sales, vegetable sales, grocery store, aguayo (multi-colored wool cloth used for adornment or as a shoulder bag) sales.

The loan will benefit the small business owners, including Martha. She states this is the first time she will be part of Pro Mujer. She joined after being invited by a friend who is a client of the institution. Martha currently sells maca juice, a business she started six years ago with her family's support.

She will use the loan to increase her capital (to buy maca wholesale) which she will buy from the wholesalers of El Alto. She will sell the maca juice in her point of sales. This business allows her to generate income to support her family. She is married and has one child.

When asked why she likes Pro Mujer, she answers that she likes the training offered by the institution.

loans.use: buy maca wholesale.

loans.name: Willan

texts.es:
Willan con 34 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente,vive junto a su cónyuge y su menor hijo, en el distrito de Pucará,provincia de Jaén,departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú. El cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a la destilación de aguardiente, con una experiencia en el rubro hace 06 años. Solicita préstamo para incrementar su plantación de caña destinadas a la destilación de aguardiente. De esta manera le permitirá poseer más materia prima para su destilación de aguardiente.

Willan es socio recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa. Ha manejado seis créditos los cuáles los a cancelado de forma puntual.
texts.en:
Willan is 34 years old and is in a common law marriage. He lives with his wife and his minor son in the district of Pucará, province of Jaén, department of Cajamarca, in Perú. He has very good personal and work references from the area residents. The residents of this locality mainly work in agriculture, commerce and ranching.

He works distilling spirits, with an experience of 6 years in this field.
He is requesting a loan to expand his plantation of cane destined for the distillation of spirits. In this way he is able to hold more raw material for his distillation of spirits.

Willan is a recurring member of Edpyme Alternativa. He handled six loans which he terminated punctually.

loans.use: to expand his plantation of cane destined for the distilling of spirits.

loans.name: Tursunjon

texts.ru: Турсунджон добрая, трудолюбивая стремительная женщина. Турсунджон родилась 1952 году в семье дехканина. Ёе родители умерли в то время когда еще Турсунджон была маленькой девочкой. Ее воспитали старшие братья и дядя.  После окончание школы Турсунджон вышла замуж. В какой то момент  она чувствовала себя самой счастливой женщиной. Но её счастье не продлилась долго. Муж Турсунджона оставив ее и дочку уехал в Россию на заработки и больше не вернулся. В это время Турсунджон чтобы прокормить семью начала разводить мелкорогатых скотов. Ведь ответственность за семью несла она. Со временем Турсунджон набирала опыт в сфере животноводства. Почти 5 лет она ждала мужа и жила с надеждой,  что один прекрасный день он вернется. Но он не возвращался домой, даже шли слухи что он там женился. По этому отец и мать мужа Турсунджона выдали свою невестку замуж. Чтобы остаток свою жизнь она прожила в счастье.  Вот спустя стольких лет Турсунджон стала самой счастливой женщиной благодаря своей терпений. Она и сейчас  занимается  откормом и купля продажам мелкорогатых скотов. И этим зарабатывает хорошие деньги, что половину она может накопить а остальное расходовать для содержанию семью. На накопленные деньги в этом году она начала ремонтировать свой дом. Но из за финансовых не хватов она не смогла закончить  ремонт и купить пластиковые окно и двери. Услышав о кредитном продукте зеленый кредит она обращался в МДО Арванд за кредитом. На полученный кредит она купит и установит современные пластиковые окно и двери.
texts.en:
Tursunjon is a decent, hard working, and fast moving woman.  She was born into a farmer's family in 1952.  Her parents died when she was still a young girl.  She was raised by her elder brothers and an uncle.  Tursunjon married after finishing school and for a time felt that she was the happiest of women, but it wasn't for long.  Her husband left her and their daughter to work in Russia and he never returned.  After he left, Tursunjon started raising cattle in order to feed her family, since it was she alone who bore the responsibility. With time, Tursunjon gained experience in animal husbandry.  Tursunjon waited five years for her husband in the hope that he would come back one fine day.   But he never did, and there were even rumors that he remarried in Russia.   Because of this, her mother- and father-in-law allowed her to remarry so that she could find happiness for the years she had left.  Thanks to her patience, after several years Tursunjon again became the happiest of women.

Tursunjon is still in business, fattening and selling cattle.  She earns such good money that she can save half and spend the other half taking care of her family.  This year, she used her savings to start repairing her home, but she doesn't have enough to finish the work and buy vinyl windows and doors.  Having heard about MDO Arvand, LLC's green loan program, Tursunjon applied for a loan.  She will use the loan to buy and install modern, vinyl windows and doors.

loans.use: to buy and install vinyl windows and doors

loans.name: Khaerea

texts.en:
Khaerea is an amazing mother who lives in a small village near Tulkarem. She has one child and she works hard to ensure a good life for her family and that they do not need anything. Khaerea's husband works as an employee, but he cannot cover all the needs of his big family. Khaerea wants to help him in any way she can and, because she is a very productive and ambitious woman, she decided to open her own business.

Khaerea started her business five years ago. She sews clothes to sell. After she felt that she had good experience in this business, she decided to expand and develop her work. Therefore she has applied for a loan to help her buy a new sewing machine, yarns and fabrics to increase her income. She needs your support to achieve her dreams.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine, yarns and fabric to increase her income.

loans.name: Furkat

texts.en:
Furkat, who was born in 1957, is married and has three children: two sons and a daughter. Furkat loves his children and he always tries for their well-being. For over seven years, Furkat has been busy with production fittings. He has a workshop and some employees. Little by little, Furkat has learned about the market and developed his business.

Furkat is asking for a loan of 3,000 Somoni to buy medicines for his daughter's treatment as she is ill and has suffered for some years from stomach issues. Furkat and his daughter await your mercy.

loans.use: to buy medicines for his daughter's treatment.

loans.name: Trang

texts.en:
Mrs. Trang is 23 years old, and she is married. She has worked in agriculture by raising poultry for three years.

Trang lives in Thieu Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in village; moreover, the market need is low in this region.

Her family has no latrine. One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is the system is not hygienic. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

This is Trang's first loan with Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution. Along with her business profit, Trang hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Xuân

texts.en:
Mrs Xuân is 29 years old and she is married. She has worked in agriculture raising poultry for more than 3 years. Xuân lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

Her household was recognized by the local government as poor, moreover the market need is low in this region. She has no collateral cause and can't get loan from other banks or credit institutions.

Her family has no latrine. One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is the latrine is not hygienic. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build toilet.

This is Xuân first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. With her business profit, Xuân hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build toilet.

loans.name: Hòa

texts.en:
Mrs Hòa, 36 years old, is married. She has worked in agriculture, raising poultry, for three years. Hòa lives in Thieu Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in the village; moreover, the market need is low in this region.

Hòa's family has no latrine, and one of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is the lack of hygiene. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

This is Hòa's first loan with Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution. With her business profit, Hòa hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to make enough money to provide for her children.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a latrine.

loans.name: Long

texts.en:
Mr. Long is 39 years old, and he is married. He has worked in agriculture by raising poultry for more than 10 years.

Long lives in Thieu Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. His family is a low-income household in the village; moreover, the market need is low in this region.

His family has no latrine. One of the most critical difficulties that concerns him is the system is not hygienic. He is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

This is Long's first loan with Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution. Along with his business profit, Long hopes for his business to do well, for his family to be healthy and happy, and to make enough money to provide for his kids.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Manuel

texts.en:
Manuel is 42 years old, married and has three children. He is a farmer that plants and harvests rice to sell. He manages his ricefield well to achieve good crop production. He uses his income for education as well as revolving capital for his wife's retail business. He is now asking for a loan of PHP 20,000 to nourish his rice crops. He will buy fertilizers and insecticides to be used in farming. This way his crops will grow healthier.

In the future, Manuel hopes to continue improving his crop production and achieve better yields someday and save funds for his family's emergency needs.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and insecticides to be used on his rice fields.

loans.name: Teodula

texts.en:
Teodula lives in the town of Talibon. She is a 52-year old married woman with five children. One of which is still attending school. She earns a living by running a sari-sari (variety) store. She sells commodities like noodles, milk, sugar, seasonings, soap, shampoo and assorted canned goods.

She would like to improve her main income to become more productive and improve the family’s living condition. She would like to purchase goods like rice, soft drinks, noodles, and sardines. In that way, she would be able to manage her business efficiently and set funds aside for expansion.

She is determined that she will become successful in handling her business and also to continue to support the welfare of the entire family.

loans.use: to purchase goods like rice, soft drinks, noodles, and sardines

loans.name: Guilly

texts.en: Guilly, 53 years old, is married and has four children, two of whom are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. For the past ten years, Guilly has operated a general store business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy additional groceries such as soft drinks, bread, spices, personal care products and other items to sell. In the future, Guilly would like to save enough money to improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy additional groceries such as soft drinks, bread, spices, personal care products and other items to sell.

loans.name: Zuhura

texts.en:
Zuhura is a married mother of four children, all of whom attend school. She lives at her own house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food.

For the past three years, she has operated a clothes selling business, selling from door to door to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of the high cost of transportation.

With the loan that she is requesting of KES 20,000, she wants to purchase stock of new clothes for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of new clothes for resale.

loans.name: Corazon

texts.en:
Corazon is 63 years old and married with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Corazon has a pottery business in the Philippines. Corazon requested a PHP 24,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy materials needed for her pottery business.

Corazon has been in this business for 13 years. In the future, Corazon would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for her pottery business.

loans.name: Halima

texts.en:
Halima is a married woman with three children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has electricity but no piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees and household consumables.

For over two years, she has operated an open air food selling business, selling from her home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her place of business.

With the KES 20,000 she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, tea leaves, and cooking fat. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, tea leaves, and cooking fat

loans.name: Alozio

texts.en: Alozio is a first-time borrower with Ugafode Microfinance Ltd. He is married and has six children. Alozio operates a retail shop and also resides there. He has applied for a loan of 4,000,000 UGX to buy items such as sugar, corn flour, soap, toiletries, batteries, and beverages that are in demand by his customers, in order to increase his sales and profit. He is very grateful for the support that Ugafode Microfinance and Kiva lenders have offered to him. Alozio hopes to make more money since he is sure the loan will increase his sales, and because he is hardworking and focused.

loans.use: to buy stock of retail items for selling.

loans.name: Makfire

texts.en:
Makfire, 52, has three adult children: two boys and one girl who are able to help out and work as well. The older one works and lives in a European country and the other is in construction. Her husband is retired and receives a pension.

Makfire used to keep cows, but she was forced to sell the cows to generate income. Now, she needs a loan to purchase again a new cow and to renovate her stable. Makfire uses the milk and milk products for her family, and she sells the rest to her neighborhood for income. She hopes that the loan will help her improve her living conditions.

Makfire promises to pay on time and in full.

loans.use: to purchase a cow to sell its milk and increase her income to improve her living conditions.

loans.name: Linda

texts.en:
Linda is a 38-year-old married mother of three. Six years ago, she started selling detergents from her house to help her husband in covering the needs and expenses of her beloved family. She is a hard worker who has a good reputation among her region.
Today, Linda is requesting a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to increase her merchandise by adding new detergents which will satisfy her customers' demands. She hopes to expand her business more in the future to increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to increase her merchandise with new detergents which will satisfy her customers' demands.

loans.name: Madona Group

texts.en:
Vilma is the featured borrower of Madona group. She got together with the other group members to acquire a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua because they have been friends since they left their hometown in the Philippines to come and work in Lebanon for a better income to support their beloved ones back in the Philippines.

Vilma is a 42-year-old, married mother of three children. She left her family in the Philippines and traveled to Lebanon to work in order to improve her family's living conditions. Today, Vilma is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to pay her children's school tuition fees. She is the second lady on the right.

With respect to the other group members, Rutchel is the second lady on the left, Rizza is the first lady on the right, and Jenelyn is the first lady on the left of the photo.

loans.use: to pay her children's school tuition fees.

loans.name: Vũ

texts.en:
Mrs Vũ is 46 years old and she is married. She has worked in agriculture raising poultry for more than 3 years. Vũ lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

Her household was recognized by the local government as poor, moreover the market need is low in this region. She has no collateral cause and can't get loan from other banks or credit institutions.

Her family has no latrine. One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is the latrine is not hygienic. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

This is Vũ first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. With her business profit, Vũ hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Matilde

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEÑOR DE HUANCA DE CALCA, él banco está ubicado en la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco. 
La socia Matilde tiene 39 años de edad y es soltera, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a su negocio de agricultura, la socia cultiva diferentes tipos de productos como papa, maíz entre otros para luego venderlos a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para comprar abono, semillas y fertilizantes.
La socia se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Matilde belongs to the communal bank Señor de Huanca de Calca. The bank is located in the Calca Province and the Cusco Department.

Matilde is 39 years old and single. She alternates her daily activities, making a living from her agricultural business. She cultivates different types of products such as potatoes and corn, among others, to later sell to her customers who request them. For a good amount of time, she has had her business, which is going well for her thanks to the determination that she puts into her business each day, which is how she provides for her family.

She is requesting the loan to purchase compost, seeds, and fertilizers.

Matilde is thankful for the loan and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to purchase compost, seeds, and fertilizer.

loans.name: Sheila

texts.en:
Sheila is 34 years old and married with three children, two of whom are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Sheila has a general store business in the Philippines. Sheila requested a PHP 14,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy additional groceries to sell.

Sheila has been in this business for three years. In the future, Sheila would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy additional groceries to sell.

loans.name: Anarin

texts.en:
Anarin is a 37-year-old married woman with four children.

Anarin works hard to provide for her family by operating a general store for 3 years. She requests a 15,000 PHP through NWTF to buy groceries to sell.

Anarin has previously borrowed and successfully repaid 5 loans from NWTF. She earns additional income from E-loading (mobile prepaid load).

Anarin aspires to save enough money to improve the quality of life.

loans.use: to buy  groceries to sell.

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
Irene is 35 years old and married with two children, one of whom is in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

Irene has a general store in the Philippines and requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell.

Irene has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, canned goods, noodles and other groceries.

In the future, Irene would like to save enough money in order to support the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with two children.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines and requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to buy more seafood to sell.

She has successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Juliet dreams that one day, she will be able to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet is a married woman with three children, all of whom attend school. She lives at a rental house that has electricity and piped water.

She has operated a retail shop business for the past one year, selling household consumables like wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. She faces a major challenge of customers taking too long to repay for goods taken on credit.

With the loan she is requesting she wants to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour

loans.name: Hamit

texts.en:
Hamit is a 38-year-old married man with a 10-year-old daughter and 7-year-old son (pictured in the photo).

Hamit's wife is a stay-at-home mom and is involved with agriculture and livestock. They own very little land, about 1.5 dynym, and grown grains and seasonal veggies for family use. They own a dairy cow and want to add purchase another with the loan. The only source of cash ($ 192/month) for the family comes from his work at a car wash service and some monthly social assistance in an amount of $35. He works in Macedonia as a laborer during the winter.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.en:
Patricia is a married woman with three children, all of whom attend school. She lives in a rental house that has electricity and piped water.

She has operated a retail shop business for the past three year, selling household consumables like wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. She faces a major challenge of creditors taking a long long time to repay her for goods taken on credit.

With this loan she is requesting, she wants to purchase more stock of sugar, bread, soap and wheat flour. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of sugar, bread, soap and wheat flour.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Ella es una ama de casa, trabaja para apoyar en la economía familiar. De pequeña sus dientes le salieron empalmados y sus padres por la falta de recursos económicos, no pudieron proporcionarle atención a su salud dental. Actualmente debido a que sus dientes están desalineados sufre de alteración en la mandíbula por lo que tiene complicación para masticar sus alimentos, aparte del evidente problema estético. Necesita un tratamiento de ortodoncia, sin embargo sus recursos no son suficientes para solventar el tratamiento.
texts.en:
She is a housewife, and she works in order to support the family finances. Ever since she was little, her teeth have overlapped. Due to the lack of financial resources, her parents were not able to provide care for her dental health.

Now, because her teeth are misaligned, she suffers from jaw changes, which make it difficult to chew her food, aside from the evident aesthetic problem.

She needs orthodontic treatment. However, she does not have enough resources to pay for the treatment.

loans.use: to pay for dental treatment.

loans.name: Adnan

texts.en:
Adnan is a 24-year-old single man who is responsible of covering the needs and expenses of two members of his family. Three years ago, he started a business to sell scarfs and perfume. He is managing his business and is becoming well-known in the region.

Adnan works hard to develop his business and requests a YOUTH loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to increase his merchandise with new items to satisfy his customers in the upcoming Christmas season.

Adnan hopes to expand his business, increase his income, and improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to increase his merchandise.

loans.name: Badrea

texts.en:
Badrea is an amazing mother who lives in Nablus city. She has three children and she is working hard to ensure a good life for them and ensure that they do not need anything.
Badrea´s husband works as employee, but he can not cover all the needs for his big family. She wants to help him in any way she can and because she is a very productive and ambitious woman, she decided to open her own business.
Badrea started her business one year ago. She sews clothes to sell. After she felt that she had good experience in this business, she decided to expand and develop her work. Therefore she applied for a loan to help her buy a new sewing machine and yarns and fabrics to increase her income.
She needs your support to achieve her dreams.

loans.use: buy a new sewing machine, yarn and fabrics.

loans.name: Shoira

texts.en:
Shoira was born in 1982. She is married and has three children. Shoira’s husband is a musician. His income is not enough to provide the family with all the necessary things, so she began a business with animal husbandry two years ago. Shoira manages the business alone, and little by little, has developed her business. She mainly feeds cows.

Shoira has a cowshed in her house. She is going to increase the number of cows she feeds, and that’s why she is asking for a loan of 5,000 somoni to buy cows. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to buy cows for increasing her working capital.

loans.name: Twitezimbere-Gakenke Group

texts.en: Beatrice is 50 years old and is married with two children who are 12 and 24 years old. She is well-known in the business of local drinks which she has been doing for about two years. Beatrice is the president of this group TWITEZIMBERE-GAKENKE. She is the one who has the papers in her hands. Beatrice's hours of selling local drinks are from 6 a.m. to 7 p.m. every day. She has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company to purchase a large quantity of sorghum to make the local drink.  With the profit from this loan, Beatrice will be able to purchase enough food for the family, to buy new clothes and shoes for the children, to pay school fees for her children, to buy medical insurance for her family and to buy some goats.

loans.use: to purchase a large quantity of sorghum to make the local drink.

loans.name: Bibiana

texts.en:
Bibiana is a fisherman and sells fish and crabs to local customers. She also makes native hats made of buli (palm).

She is a 62-year old married woman with ten grown children who lives in the town of Talibon.

She needs a loan to purchase a crab net and improve her daily catch. She will be able to provide nutritious meals and settle her obligation.

Bibiana plans to set aside half of the profit for emergency use while the other half is for business expansion for sustainable livelihood to prepare for retirement.

loans.use: to purchase a crab net.

loans.name: Eva

texts.en:
Eva is a 56-year-old married woman with four children, one attends school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur

Eva has had a pottery business for 10 years and requests 18,000 PHP through NWTF to buy materials for her pottery business.

In the future, Eva would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy  materials for her pottery business.

loans.name: Noemi Del Ci

texts.es:
Noemi de 48  años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado de nivel académico, está casada y el esposo se dedica a la agricultura, en esta relación han procreado  4 hijos  los cuales dos de ellos están en la escuela y los demás en hogares apartes, con Noemi vive el esposo y dos de sus hijos.


Noemi ,tiene 21 años de dedicarse a la sastrería, oficio que se lo enseñó su mamá ya que ella se dedicaba a lo mismo y es algo que le genera muy buenos ingresos, además en ocasiones le ayuda al esposo en la ganadería ya que él ordeña y vende la leche, esto lo hace de las 2 pm a las 5 pm cuando ya ha terminado los quehaceres de la casa.


Noemi   necesita el crédito para comprar telas e hilos para la sastrería y también comprará una novilla.

Sus sueños son tener mas vida para seguir trabajando y aportar algo a ala casa y que los hijos sean unos profesionales y junto al  esposo con sacrificio salir adelante y tener una venta de leche muy conocida.
texts.en:
Noemi, age 48, went to school through the ninth grade. She is married, and her husband works in agriculture. They have four children. Two of them are in school, and the others live in separate households. Noemi lives with her husband and two of their children. Noemi has been tailoring for 21 years. Her mother taught her this trade because she did the same thing. It is something that generates very good earnings. At times she also helps her husband with the livestock because he milks and sells the milk. She does this from 2:00 p.m. until 5:00 p.m. when she has finished the household chores.

Noemi needs the loan to buy fabric and thread for tailoring, and she will also buy a heifer.

Her dreams are to live longer in order to continue working, to give some support at home, for her children to become professionals, to get ahead through sacrifice with her husband, and to have a well-known business selling milk.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread for tailoring and to also buy a heifer.

loans.name: Mariafe

texts.en:
Mariafe is 42 years old and has three children, two of whom are currently in school. She is married.

Mariafe is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines. She requested a 35,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Mariafe has been in this business for 15 years now, and has borrowed 11 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Mariafe would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Bashkim

texts.en: Bashkim is a 37-year-old married male living in Kosovo with his wife, one daughter and his parents. For the last 9 years he has worked as a hairdresser for others so that he could gain experience. This year, he is planning to start his own business as a hairdresser. In order to start his business, he was able to obtain most of the money from his parents, and the remaining part will be from the loan. Bashkim requested the loan to pay for the start-up inventory, such as the chairs, tables and doors. This loan will help him to start his business and will allow him to develop his business and increase the number of clients. He will use the income generated from the business to support his family. In the future, he plans to expand his business more by opening another salon and hiring his own employees. He is very happy for this opportunity and wants to thank all of the lenders.

loans.use: to pay for the start-up inventory for a hair salon to increase his number of clients.

loans.name: Doriane

texts.en:
Doriane is a first-year student at Kepler. She grew up in Burundi, a small country that borders Rwanda to the south. After a rigorous application process based on grades, test scores, and personal interviews, she was accepted from over 6,000 applicants this year. Doriane is only one of five students from Burundi ever accepted to the Kepler program. The first in her family to attend university, she chose Kepler because it offered a relevant, international education.

Doriane plans to major in communications with a concentration in business, and will graduate from Kepler with a B.A. from an accredited U.S. university. After graduating, she would like to become an entrepreneur.

loans.use: to pay for a laptop required for a U.S. college degree.

loans.name: Ella

texts.en:
Ella is a first-year student at Kepler. She grew up in Burundi, which borders Rwanda to the south. Due to her impressive academic record, she was accepted from over 6,000 applicants this year—one of only 5 Burundian students accepted to Kepler. Ella chose to attend because it offered her the ability to attend an international program without having to study far from home.

Ella plans to major in Health Care Management, and will graduate Kepler with a BA from an accredited US university. She thinks her greatest contribution to Kepler will be her quantitative skills and she hopes to use these to found a hospital in her home country one day.

loans.use: to pay for a laptop required for a US college degree.

loans.name: Alliane Consolatrice

texts.en:
Alliance is a first-year student at Kepler. She grew up in Burundi, which borders Rwanda to the south. After a rigorous application process based on grades, test scores, and personal interviews, she was accepted from over 6,000 applicants this year. Alliance is only one of 5 students from Burundi ever accepted to the Kepler program. She chose to attend because it offered her a chance to develop her professional skills, while working toward an international degree.

Alliance plans to major in Communications with a concentration in business, and will graduate from Kepler with a BA from an accredited US university. After graduating, she thinks she might work in communications or finance to support her family and community.

loans.use: to pay for a laptop required for a US college degree.

loans.name: Layla

texts.en:
Layla is a 25-year-old married woman with two children. Four years ago, she started working as a nurse to help her husband to meet the needs and expenses of their children. She is a hard worker and ambitious lady who is trying hard improve her family's living conditions.

She will use the loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to buy bedroom furniture for her children and visit holy places. Layla hopes to stay capable of providing her family with descent living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a bedroom furniture for her children and visit holy places.

loans.name: Ranil

texts.en:
Ranil is a fisherman who lives in Tubigon, Bohol. He has been doing this for seven years to rear his family and support their needs. Thus, he has four children; they are 15, 14, 11 and 8 years old. And his wife takes good care of them. 

In spite of the obstacles that Ranil encountered in his life, he was still determined to continue. With this in mind, he needs an amount to buy fishing nets. Part of the loan amount will be used to repair his fishing boat, specifically, he will buy plywood and boat engine. In this way, he will be able to keep his fishing boat in good condition and be able to improve his catch with his new fishing net. 

Ranil’s goal in life is to improve his livelihood for his family.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets and repair his fishing boat.

loans.name: Elias Samuel

texts.es: Elías es un hombre trabajador de 36 años de edad que vive con su compañera de vida y sus 3 hijos una niña de 2 años y dos varones de 8 y 6 años de edad. Él presta sus servicios de albañil en una empresa constructora, lo que le permite llevar el sustento a su familia. Elías desea mejorar el techo de su vivienda, que se encuentra deteriorada, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: lámina, polines, pines y cemento para cambiar el techo deteriorado de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Elias is a hard-working 36-year-old man who lives with his life partner and their 3 children, one 2-year-old girl, and two 8- and 6-year-old boys. He lends his services as a construction worker in a construction company, which allows his to brings sustenance to his family.

Elias wishes to improve the roof of his home, which is deteriorated, for which he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to purchase: sheet metal, beams, pins, and cement to replace the deteriorated roof of his home.

loans.use: to purchase: sheet metal, beams, pins, and cement to replace the deteriorated roof of his home.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita previously accessed a 20,000 PHP loan to buy soft brooms to resell. As a widow, her earnings were a big help meet her children’s, household, and business expenditures. She would like to extend her grateful appreciation to CCT (for facilitating her loan from Kiva), and most especially to you, generous lenders.

This time, she would like to apply for 25,000 PHP to buy grocery items, beverages, and soft brooms to resell. The more items she has on display and available on hand, the better. It will result to a better profit that will sustain their daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Lolita dreams for her children to find stable jobs and have a brighter future. She faithfully meets weekly with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the word of God. *All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital, and pay micro-finance loans.

loans.use: to buy  grocery items,  beverages, and brooms to resell.

loans.name: Carmen María

texts.es: Carmen es una comerciante de 46 años que decidió continuar con el negocio familiar de venta de mercancía, ella inició vendiendo calzado y a los años expandió su oferta de productos, cuando una amiga le propuso incorporarse a una empresa multinivel.  Hoy en día maneja una gran variedad de productos entre ello electrodomésticos, artículos para el hogar, prendas de vestir, calzado, productos para el cuidado facial, corporal y capilar, su compromiso es grande ella labora de lunes a sábado, desde bien temprano hasta las 8 p.m. promocionando los productos en las viviendas de sus clientes. En la actualidad realizó una solicitud de crédito, un credikiva, oportunidad para vincularse a la vida financiera a través de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para atender unos requerimientos de productos de sus clientes; prendas de vestir, artículos de tocador y electrodomésticos menores como planchas, licuadoras, cafeteras entre otros.  A futuro Carmen se proyecta con un almacén bien surtido y ofreciendo más bienestar a su familia.
texts.en:
Carmen is a 46 year old businesswoman. She decided to continue with the family business in sales. She started selling shoes and, a few years later, she expanded her product offering when a friend proposed they established a multilevel enterprise.
