loans.use: to buy more bulls for fattening.

loans.name: Evarist

texts.en:
Evarist is a hard-working married man and devoted father who lives in Kamwenge, Uganda. He used a previous Kiva loan to buy more maize and coffee to sell. He still sells produce, which is his main source of income. He supplements this with farming to earn extra income and to help improve the living standards of his family.

His dream is to expand his farm and his produce business in order to earn more profit. He wants to be able to educate all his children and equip them with skills that will also help them earn a living to sustain themselves, but his main challenge is inadequate capital.

He wants to use the loan to buy seedlings, fertilizers, and manure for his farm.

loans.use: to buy seedlings, fertilizers, and manure for his farm.

loans.name: Norma Yannette

texts.es:
Norma, de 40 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado, está acompañada, su pareja tiene un camión en el cual hace viajes dentro y fuera de la comunidad, no tienen hijos y viven en casa propia.

Norma, se dedica a la venta de tortillas, elotes, camotes y yuca y trabaja vendiendo estos productos desde que era niña.

Norma, necesita el préstamo para comprar ganado para engordarlo y de la leche elaborar productos lácteos.

Norma, sueña con que su negocio sea estable y que crezca más.
texts.en:
Norma, 40 years old, studied until third grade. She is in a common-law relationship. Her partner has a truck in which he makes trips within and outside of the community. They do not have children and they live in their own home. 

Norma works in the sale of tortillas, corn on the cob, sweet potatoes, and yuca. She has worked selling these products since she was a girl.

Norma needs the loan to buy cattle to plump up and give milk to produce dairy products. 

Norma dreams that her business will be stable and grow more.

loans.use: to buy cattle to plump up and give milk to produce dairy products.

loans.name: Constance

texts.en:
Constance is a hard-working married mother of six children who lives in Kamwenge, Uganda. She carries out farming in addition to running a hotel, businesses she started five years ago with the intention of growing her income and taking good care of her family.

In the future, Constance wants to expand her hotel business so as to earn more profits and educate her children, but she faces challenges of inadequate capital and high competition. This limits her stock turnover and the productivity of her business.

Constance seeks financial support in the form of a loan from Hofokam Ltd. to buy manure and seedlings, as well as supplies for her hotel, such as sacks of rice and beans.

loans.use: to buy manure and seedlings, as well as more supplies for her hotel, such as sacks of rice and beans.

loans.name: Parvina

texts.ru: Парвина 19 летняя мастерица района Шахринав. На районе Шахринав многие молодые девушки уже мастерица. Они рожденные девушки для этой сфере деятельностью. У многих девушек есть большая мечта, цели и талант. Они не смотря ни на что, стараются. Парвина идет по стопам матери. Ее мама была опытной и знаменитой мастерицей. Она научила Парвины, чтобы ее дочка стало талантливой рукодельницей. Парвина 2 года назад начала свою работу. Ей нравится шить женское национальное платье. Она еще шьет детскую форму на заказ. Парвина решила расширить свою деятельность. Она хочет купить себе новую многофункциональную швейную машинку. Новая машинка поможет ей ускорить процесс работы и привлечь больше клиентов.
texts.en:
Parvina is a 19 years old expert seamstress from the Shahrinav region. Many young women in the Shahrinav region are already experts at sewing. They are born for this type of activity. Many young women have big dreams, goals and talent. They strive hard no matter what.

Parvina is following in her mother's footsteps. Her mother was an experienced and knowledgeable expert. She taught Parvina in order for her daughter to be a talented needlewoman. Two years ago, Parvina started working. She likes to sew women's traditional dresses. She also sews children's clothing on order.

Parvina decided to expand her business. She would like to purchase a new, multifunctional sewing machine. A new machine will help her make the work processes faster and attract more customers.

loans.use: to purchase a multifunctional sewing machine

loans.name: Mayra Alejandra

texts.es:
Mayra Alejandra con 30 años de edad,de estado civil conviviente,vive en casa familiar,junto a su cónyuge y su hija, en el distrito de Zaña,provincia de Chiclayo,departamento de Lambayeque,país Perú. Ella cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores, con una experiencia en el rubro desde hace más de 02 años, en su propio domicilio. Solicita préstamo para capital de trabajo, para la compra de más animales como patos, gallinas,pavos y otros. De esta manera beneficia económicamente a su familia.

Mayra Alejandra es socia nueva para Edpyme Alternativa, sin embargo cuenta con historial crediticio en otras entidades.
texts.en:
30-year-old Mayra Alejandra is in a common law marriage. She lives with her spouse and her daughter in a house located in the district of Zaña, province of Chiclayo, deparment of Lambayeque, country of Perú. She has very good references, both personal and professional, from the local people. The inhabitants of that community work mostly in agriculture, retail and raising cattle.

She raises and sells small animals at her own home. She has more than two years of experience in this line of work. She requests the loan in order to get working capital so that she can purchase more animals such as ducks, chickens, turkeys, etc. That way she'll improve her family's economic conditions.

Mayra Alejandra is a new client of Edpyme Alternativa, but she does have a credit history with other institutions.

loans.use: to get working capital so she can purchase more animals such as ducks, chickens, turkeys, etc.

loans.name: Twizerane Group

texts.en:
Josiane is 36 years old and is married with four children who are between 4 and 15 years old. She is well-known in the business for her food and drinks canteen, which she has been doing for about eight years. Josiane is the president of this group TWIZERANE in local language and in English is to trust each other. This is her eight time to request loan in Vision Finance Company and she is happy because she can pay her loans without any problem. She has an envelope in her hand.

Josiane's hours of selling are from 6 a.m. to 8 p.m. every day. She wants to request a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company to expand her business by purchasing a large quantity of food and drinks such as: tea, cakes ,milk ,bread for sale.

With the profit from this loan, Josiane will be able to purchase enough food for the family, to buy new clothes and shoes for the children, to pay school fees for her children and to buy medical insurance for her family.

loans.use: to expand her canteen by purchasing a large quantity of food and drinks such as: tea, cakes, milk, bread... for sale.

loans.name: Switzer

texts.en:
Switzer is a very hardworking old married man with seven children living in Fort Portal, Uganda.

He is a model farmer in his village and has been in the farming business for twenty-five years. He mainly grows tea and also rears cows. With the proceeds he has been able to buy more land and pay school fees for his children.

Unpredictable weather changes and price fluctuation are his major challenges, while his dream is to expand his farming activities and be able to export the surplus to nearby countries.

Switzer is in need of a loan to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Aramayis

texts.en: This young man’s name is Aramayis and he is 24 years old. He lives in Sevan city in the Gegharkunik region of Armenia with his nice sister, who is a student and future teacher/pedagogue. Their parents are in the Russian Federation now and from there, they work and transfer money for their children needs. Aramayis is a mechanic and he now works at a private company. Aramyis wants to make some repairs to their flat since his parents are going to come back from Russia around New Year's in order to pass the holidays with the family and this would be a great surprise for them. Aramayis requests this loan of 500,000 Armenian drams in order to do a slight cosmetic repairing of the house to surprise their parents.

loans.use: to do some repairs on the house to surprise his parents.

loans.name: Samuel Eugenio

texts.es:
Samuel está solicitando un nuevo crédito para comprar pollos de engorde que tengan corta edad, de esta manera podrá aprovechar la temporada de buenas ventas en diciembre, con la inversión su negocio se fortalecerá y dará un buen servicio a sus clientes.
Para Samuel el crédito anterior ha sido de mucha ayuda para mejorar su negocio, pues manifiesta tener estabilidad económica y cubre las necesidades básicas de su familia
texts.en:
Samuel is requesting a new loan to buy broiler chickens of young age. In this way, he will be able to take advantage of the season of good sales in December. With this investment, his business will strengthen and provide good service to his customers. 

For Samuel, the previous loan has been very helpful to improve his business, as he appears to have economic stability and covers the basic needs of his family.

loans.use: to buy broiler chickens of young age. In this way, he will be able to take advantage of the season of good sales in December.

loans.name: Gloria Maribel

texts.es:
Gloria tiene 24 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado, está acompañada y su pareja  es motorista, tienen una hija que está pequeña y vive con ellos. En casa de Gloria viven 5 personas pero solo su hija depende de ella.


Gloria se dedica a la venta de cosméticos por medio de revista, tiene 8 años de dedicarse a este trabajo, comenzó como vendedora pero ahora es asesora, el trabajo lo aprendió sola y decidió dedicarse a esto porque le gusta y deseaba a poyar a su familia  en los gastos del hogar. El trabajo ella  lo desempeña en tres municipios  y su horario es 5 a 8 horas al día según la demanda. 


Ella solicita este crédito para poner un local fijo de venta  de cosméticos y otros productos en el municipio donde vive, ya que hoy en día tiene que viajar a diferentes partes por lo que le gustaría poner un puesto formal pues ya tiene clientes que la buscan por sus buenos servicios. 

Gloria sueña con tener un negocio fuerte de prosperidad,  sueña con poner una sala de belleza  que es una profesión que le encanta. Para su familia desea que cada día estén en mejores condiciones de vida y se considera una persona emprendedora y trabajadora por lo que el préstamo le ayudará a comenzar una carrera y un propósito.
texts.en:
Gloria is 24 years old and has a ninth grade education. She is in a relationship and her partner is a driver. They have a young daughter who lives with them. Five people live in Gloria's home but only her daughter is dependent upon her.

Gloria works selling cosmetics through catalog sales. She has been doing this for eight years. She started as a salesperson but is now a consultant. She learned to do this job on her own and decided to start working because she likes this work and she wanted to support her family with the household expenses. She works in three cities, between 5 and 8 hours a day depending upon the demand.

She is asking for this loan to open a storefront in the city where she lives to sell cosmetics and other products. As she currently has to travel to different places, she would like to have her own formal storefront as she now has clients who seek her out for the good services she offers.

Gloria dreams of having a strong and prosperous business and of opening a beauty salon, which is a profession that she loves. She hopes that each day her family may have better living conditions. She sees herself as a hardworking and entrepreneurial person and so the loan will help her to start her career and to have a purpose.

loans.use: to open a storefront in the city where she lives to sell cosmetic products.

loans.name: Liliam Maribel

texts.es: Lilian de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia con su madre y su padrastro, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas desde hace 5 años y con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda cambiando el techo pero con lo que obtiene de sus ventas no le alcanza para realizarlo por esa razon esta solicitando a INTEGRAL un credito para la compra de los materiales necesarios y asi poder tener una vivienda ma segura.
texts.en: Lilian is 37 years old and lives in her own house with her mother and stepfather. She has worked selling tortillas since 5 years ago and with what she earns from the sales manages to cover some of the expenses of her household. She wants to improve the dwelling by replacing the roof but with the earnings from sales she can't achieve that. That's why she's asking for an INTEGRAL loan to buy the necessary materials and be able to have a more secure home.

loans.use: to buy the necessary materials.

loans.name: Hemed

texts.en:
Hemed, who is in his late 40's, is married with four children. Two are still in school and two are grown up. He has been a tailor for sixteen years now. He works from 6 am to 10 pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be his 3rd loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans to buy sewing products and has managed to pay back all his loans successfully. He used the profit to pay school fees, to repay loan and covered household expenses. He will use this loan to buy sewing products for his tailoring business. He dreams of finishing building his house.

Hemed will be accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy sewing products for his tailoring business.

loans.name: Alba Del Carmen

texts.es:
El  señora Alba  tiene 45 años de edad, vive con sus hijos y es madre soltera, su actividad principal es la venta de comidas y tiene muchos años de dedicarse a esta actividad.

Doña Alba lucha día con día para salir adelante y está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de carnes, arroz, plátano, verduras, frijoles, etc. para poder seguir elaborando su producto y de esta manera obtener las ganancias necesarias para poder salir adelante con su familia.

Doña Alba uno de sus sueños es poder tener un buen restaurante.

Trojes, Honduras - Noviembre del 2015
texts.en:
Alba is 45 years old and lives with her children. She is a single mother. Her main business is selling meals and she has been doing this for many years.

Alba strives day by day to get ahead and is requesting the loan to buy meat, rice, plantains, vegetables, beans, etc. Then she can continue to make her product and in this manner obtain the earnings needed to be able to get ahead with her family.

One of Alba's dreams is to be able to have a good restaurant.

Trojes, Honduras - November 2015.

loans.use: to buy meat, rice, plantains, vegetables, beans, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en: Rosita knows how to utilize the space in her house. She use some lands to cultivate vegetables like spring onions, string beans and pechay (bok choy). As a mother of two dependents aged 15 and 17, she works hard in her farm to make her business profitable.  She is asking  a loan to buy fertilizer and pechay seedlings that she can grow in her prepared lots.  She hoped to increase her income so her family can live in abundance.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pechay seedlings

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita, 43 years old, manages a retail store in Polomolok, South Cotabato. The profit derived from her business augments her husband Julius’ salary and supports the education of their three children, two of whom are studying in college while the youngest is still in elementary level. 

Many Filipinos earn a living on a daily basis. Meaning, they are paid after every day of work, 200 PHP or 300 PHP per day for example. They budget this amount for daily food, transportation, and other usual expenses. Therefore they cannot afford to buy big volume of supplies for long time household use such as sacks of rice, big bottles of cooking oil, several kilos of sugar, and so on. This is the reason why retail stores are very common in different communities. Customers buy repacked cooking oil good for one-time cooking or one sachet of shampoo good for two showers. 

Just like other store owners, Rosita suffers from long term debt of some of her neighbors, which affects the stability of her business. This is why she applied for a 15,000 PHP loan to buy stock of groceries, rice, charcoal, and soft drinks. In due time, she aspires to widen her inventory so she can attract more customers.  

She prays for a college diploma for all her children and good living conditions for her whole family someday. She shares her experiences and aspirations with her co-fellowship* members at CCT Credit Cooperative. They regularly meet every week to share stories about their life and businesses and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God. 

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to buy stock of groceries, rice, charcoal, and soft drinks

loans.name: Norma Elizabeth

texts.es:
Norma administra una granja de pollos de engorde, ella tiene 42 años de edad, es casada y tiene una hija, su esposo tiene 42 años de edad y su hija tiene 22 años de edad, la cual se encuentra estudiando en la universidad, Norma cuenta que trabaja todos los días en la granja de pollos, ella aprendió de su madre el oficio y hace aproximadamente 5 años opto por independizarse y tener un negocio propio.
Para tener un mejor inventario y aumentar sus ingresos, ha decidido solicitar un crédito para poder comprar pollos de pocos días de nacidos, concentrado y vitaminas, mantendrá en óptimas condiciones los animales para poder comercializarlos en la temporada navideña, espera que sus clientes hagan pedidos mucho más grandes en dicha temporada para generar nuevas ganancias.
Su visión es mantenerse trabajando para que su negocio permanezca en actividad y así poder apoyar a su hija para que finalice sus estudios y tenga un mejor estilo de vida.
texts.en:
Norma runs a farm for fattening chickens. She is 42 years old, is married and has one daughter. Her husband is 42 years old and her daughter is 22 years old and is currently studying at the university. Norma shares that she works every day at the chicken farm. She learned this trade from her mother and about five years ago, decided to become independent and start her own business.

In order to have a better inventory and increase her income, she has decided to ask for a loan to buy newborn chickens, pellets and vitamins. She will keep the animals in optimal conditions in order to sell them in the Christmas season. She hopes that her clients will place bigger orders in this season in order to earn new profits.

Her vision is to continue to work to keep her business running and be able to support her daughter so that she can finish her studies and thus have a better way of life.

loans.use: to buy newborn chickens, pellets and vitamins.

loans.name: Dersy Delia

texts.es:
Dersy es una joven estudiante de Diseño de Modas, eligió estudiar esa carrera porque desde pequeña le gusta mucho todo lo referente a la moda. Siempre estuvo involucrada al rubro del diseño de prendas de vestir porque tiene familiares que se dedican a ese rubro. Ella siente que, el estudiar esta carrera la beneficiará mucho porque le permitirá ser una persona sumamente exitosa, que brindará el apoyo necesario a su familia que tanto hace por ella.

Ella lleva estudiando un año de su carrera, le falta aún 2 años para culminar su carrera. Le va muy bien en sus estudios, le dedica 40 horas semanales y en sus horas libres apoya a su madre en sus trabajos de confección, lo que le permite poner en práctica todo lo aprendido en clases.

Cuando acabe su carrera, a Dersy le gustaría trabajar diseñando prendas de vestir, buscando empresas que le brinden la oportunidad de desarrollarse profesionalmente, ganar más experiencia, para más adelante poder formar su propia empresa de diseñadora de modas.

El mayor obstáculo que tiene Dersy es el económico, que no le permite realizar con tranquilidad sus estudios. También no cuenta con el apoyo de su padre, quien los abandonó cuando ella era muy pequeña. Dersy vive solo con su madre, quien se encuentra delicada de salud. Por estos motivos, Dersy recurre a KIVA para que le puedan brindar el apoyo que necesita y pueda así seguir estudiando la carrera por la que siente mucha pasión y dedicación. Este crédito la ayudará con los gastos de las mensualidades de sus estudios y continuar luchando por sus sueños.

Dersy se siente muy agradecida y con ganas de seguir adelante, teniendo la tranquilidad de terminar sus estudios en el tiempo estimado. Quiere expresarles unas líneas en agradecimiento por el apoyo brindado: "Ante todo que Dios los bendiga a cada uno de ustedes por apoyar de esta manera a jóvenes estudiantes como yo que tenemos deseos de superación, pero no contamos con los recursos económicos para seguir adelante. Gracias KIVA!"
texts.en:
Dersy is a young fashion design student who chose to study for this degree because ever since she was young she loved all aspects of fashion.  She has always been involved with designing garments, because she has relatives who also work in this area.  She feels that studying for this degree will be a great benefit to her, because it will enable her to become a very successful person who will provide the support needed to her family, who has done so much for her.

Dersy has studied in this specialty for a year, and she needs 2 more years to finish her degree.  She is doing very well in her studies; she devotes 40 hours a week to her education, and in her free time she supports her mother with her dressmaking work.  This allows her to put into practice everything she is learning in her classes.

When she finishes her degree, Dersy would like to work designing garments.  She will look for companies that will provide her the opportunity for professional development and experience so that in the future she can establish her own fashion design company.

Dersy's main obstacle is financial; she is not able to continue her education without financial stress.  Also, she lacks the support of her father, who abandoned the family when she was very young.  Dersy lives only with her mother, who is in delicate health.  For this reason, Dersy has come to Kiva to obtain the support she needs and to enable her to continue to study toward her degree.  She is dedicated and passionate about her studies.  This loan will help Dersy to make the monthly payments for her studies so that she can continue to strive toward her dreams. 

Dersy feels very grateful and has a strong desire to get ahead, and now she feels tranquil that she can continue her studies on schedule.  She expresses her thanks for the support she is getting in the following statement.  "Most of all, I hope that God will bless each and every one of you for helping young students like me, who have the desire to excel but who lack the financial resources to continue forward.  Thank you Kiva!"

loans.use: to pay for her studies in fashion design

loans.name: Ivette Abigail

texts.es:
Ivette, de 25 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado, está casada, su esposo vive en  Estados Unidos y tiene dos hijos que aún no están en edad de ir a la escuela.

Ivette, hace poco tiempo ha iniciado un negocio pequeño de panadería, porque no estudio y no logro obtener un trabajo formal y estable, es por eso que aprendió a hacer pan y ahora tiene su pequeño negocio.

Ivette, necesita el préstamo para construir un techo y comprar otro horno para su panadería.

Ivette, sueña con tener una panadería grande y que esa sea la principal fuente de ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Ivette is 25 years old and completed third grade. She's married and her husband lives in the United States. She has two children who haven't reached school age yet.

A little while ago Ivette started a small bakery, because she didn't study and wasn't able to find formal, stable employment. That's why she learned how to make bread and now she has her own small business.

Ivette needs the loan so that she can put up a roof and purchase another oven for her bakery.

Ivette dreams of owning a large bakery that becomes the main source of income for her family.

loans.use: to put up a roof and purchase another oven for her bakery.

loans.name: Shaip

texts.en:
Shaip is 64 years old and married. He is the father of three children. They live in a village in the northern part of Kosovo. Shaip is a very hard worker and has had a lot of experience working on her land for many years. He works on agricultural land, planting corn and wheat and then use for selling them. This is how he earns a living.

Now he is in need of a loan to buy new working tools for a tractor and rimorkio. With the help of this loan, he can expand and facilitate his work. Shaip is able to support his family through his business efforts. He hopes to keep earning his own living in order not to ask for help from others. Shaip’s goal is to save money for his family's future. He wants to thank all Kiva lenders !

loans.use: to buy new working tools for a tractor and rimorkio to facilitate his work to increase his sales

loans.name: Ilhom

texts.en: Ilhom is a 42 year old farmer from Shahrituz. He has a plot of land on which he raises crops. Every season Ilhom plants different vegetables. This year he planted wheat and plans on having a large, quality harvest. In order to have such a harvest, he needs to fertilize his crops. On his plot of land, he has decided to plant potatoes. He is requesting a loan to purchase a large amount of fertilizer and potato seeds. His beloved wife helps him in his work.  Please help Ilhom in his financial difficulties.

loans.use: To purchase potato seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Franklin Adalberto

texts.es: Franklin de 30 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el se dedica a la venta de pan frances desde hace 5 años, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el quiere mejorar su vivienda encementando el piso pero como no posee de suficiente capital esta solicitando un credito para la compra de cemento, arena y pago de mano de obra para poder mejorar su casa y asi vivir mas comodos.
texts.en: Franklin is 30 years old and lives in his own home with his wife. He has worked selling French bread for the past five years. With the sales that he makes, he is able to cover some of the household expenses. He wants to improve his home by cementing the floor but, he does not have sufficient capital. He is asking for a loan to buy cement, sand, and to pay for labor costs in order to improve his home and be able to live more comfortably.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and to pay for labor costs.

loans.name: Mauricio Edilberto

texts.es: Mauricio de 29 años de edad, vive al lado de su compañera de vida, sus hijos de 5 y 7 años de edad. Él es un padre muy responsable quien lucha para que a su familia no le falte nada, para lo cual ha instalado una tienda en su vivienda, también para expandir su negocio sale a las calles a vender refrescos, así también vende almuerzo por encargo. Gracias a estos negocios logra obtener los ingresos necesarios para cubrir los gastos de su vivienda. Cuenta con varios años de dedicarse a estos negocios lo que le permite contar con una cantidad algo grande de clientes quienes le prefieren y en vista que la demanda ha aumentado solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: materia prima para la elaboración de almuerzos y productos para surtir la tienda. De esta manera aumentar las ventas y con ello las ganancias.
texts.en:
Mauricio, 29, lives with his life partner and their children, aged 5 and 7.  He is a very responsible father who struggles to see that his family has everything they need.  To provide for them, he has set up a store in his house.  To expand his business, he also sells drinks in the streets and sells lunches through orders.  Thanks to these businesses, he has managed to generate the income he needs to cover the expenses of his household.  

Mauricio has had these businesses for a number of years, and so he now has a lot of customers who prefer his business.  Because of the increase in demand that he has experienced, he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in supplies to make lunches and products to stock up his store.  This way his sales and earnings will increase.

loans.use: to buy food to make his lunches, and products for his store

loans.name: Shaba Group

texts.en:
Gideon, who is in his early 30's is married with one small child. He has been running a gengeduka for three years now. He works from 6.45 am to 8.45 pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be his 3rd loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans to increase on the genge and opened a duka. He has managed to pay back all his loans successfully. He is happy with the loan and appreciates Kiva for the support of their group which is doing great.

He used the profit to take care of his family, to repay loan,reinvest in business and covered household expenses. He will use this loan to restock the out of stock items in the gengeduka store. He dreams of expanding his business into a super market.

GIDEON will share this loan with his loan group Shaba which has two members who will hold each other accountable for,paying back the loan.

loans.use: to restock the out of stock items in the gengeduka store.

loans.name: Annet

texts.en: Annet is a 19 year old single lady living in Fort Portal Uganda. She owns a retail shop where she works 12 hours a day and has been doing this business for one year. She started this business with a dream of employing herself and raising more income for her family. Annet is facing challenges of low capital that hinder her from expanding her business to new areas. Annet has asked for a loan that will allow her buy retail items like soap, sugar and rice to sell.

loans.use: to buy retail items like soap, sugar and rice to sell.

loans.name: Joiada

texts.en:
Two years ago, Joiada successfully started her poultry business. She was doing this to have additional income to supports her husband in raising their family. Joida is a married woman and has two children. The oldest child is 14 years while the youngest child is two years old. She is 29 years old and lives in the city of Baybay, Leyte.

Joida’s main goal in life is to improve her business for their sustainability. She also wants to give her family a better life. With this, she is asking for a loan to buy more chicks to raise and feed as well.

In this way, she will be able to raise more chicks to lay eggs and adults to sell. With this, it increases her sales and augments her profits.

loans.use: to buy more chicks to raise and feed as well

loans.name: Helena

texts.en: For twelve years, Helena is into hog raising and supplying of sand and gravel for a business.  She lives in Garcia Hernandez, Bohol. Helena rely on this livelihood so that her son can have a better future. She works hard with her husband in keeping this business for their future. She is asking a loan to buy digging bar, boots, shovel, sand screen filter and empty sacks that they can use to speed up their production. It is her dream to have her house repaired and her child to continue to school.

loans.use: to buy digging bar, boots, shovel, sand screen filter and empty sacks

loans.name: Hermenegildo

texts.en:
Hermenegildo is a 61-year-old man. He has been married for long time to a loving wife, and he and his wife have seen their children transform onto grown-up adults who have families of their own. Their sons help to pay for some of Hermenegildo's house expenses.
Nevertheless, Hermenegildo runs a street stand in which he sells shoes, sandals and sleepers. On the same stand but on the other side his wife sells sunglasses of every type. Hermenegildo and his wife work Monday to Saturday, 10 hours per day, and Hermenegildo runs another street stand on Sundays in which he sells clothes.
Hermengildo's biggest achievement is to create a business that could provide for his family and move his children ahead. His biggest dream is to travel on an airplane.
Hermenegildo is looking to increase his stock size by taking a 9,600 MXN which will allow him to buy a vast variety of sandals, shoes, sleepers, clothes and sunglasses to resell.

loans.use: to restock his street stand with shoes and sunglasses.

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is a man on his early 50's, he is divorced, but still pays alimony to his former wife and he provides for his daughter, by paying her study's expenses and the rent of the house in which she lives.

To address a living, David has been running a transportation business for the last 4 years. The main idea of the business is to transport person like a taxi site, but a little bit more personal and private. He only provides a service under a phone request.

He owns a few cars and employs some people as drivers. He is a source of employment and he thinks that his business will expand if he is able to invest on advertising. He dreams about having a bigger business to manage a higher income and to be a bigger employment source.

David is eager to see his business grow, because he has invested a massive amount of effort and time in it, to make it grow he is applying for a 7,369.00 MXN which will allow him to expand his business by creating new advertizing.

loans.use: to invest in advertising his transportation business.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
María vive en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y dos hijos, uno de sus hijos es maestro y le apoya económicamente, ella comenta no tener ayuda de remesas, su propio negocio es atender un taller de costura, además de fabricar prendas de vestir tienen experiencia elaborando manteles, cortinas y cobertores para electrodomésticos, aprendió el oficio mediante cursos, su horario de trabajo es de ocho de la mañana a nueve la noche, puede variar según la cantidad de trabajo que tenga.
En la temporada de fin de año sus productos son más demandados, ella solicita capital prestado para comprar telas, hilos y adornos para fabricar sus productos en mayor cantidad y atraer a más clientes, se siente optimista en que recuperara la inversión con buenas utilidades y resarcir su deuda en el tiempo acordado.
Sus sueños son tener en el futuro menos deudas y aportar al sostenimiento de su familia.
texts.en:
Maria lives in her own home along with her life partner and two children. One of her children is a teacher and helps her economically. She comments that she does not have the help of remittances. Her own business is to tend to a sewing workshop, and she also makes clothing garments. She has experience making tablecloths, curtains, and covers for electrical appliances. She learned this trade through courses. Her work schedule is from eight in the morning to nine at night, but it can vary depending on the amount of work that she has.

In the season at the end of the year, her products are in higher demand. She is requesting the loan to buy fabrics, threads, and adornments to make her products in greater quantity and to attract more customers. She feels optimistic that she will get back the investment with good profits and that she will pay her debt in the agreed upon time.

Her dreams are to have fewer debts in the future and to contribute to the support of her family.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, threads, and adornments to make her products in greater quantity and to attract more customers.

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en:
Fatima is a 52-year-old married mother of two. She started working in tailoring and preparing "Mouneh" to help her husband in covering the increasing needs and expenses of their children. She is a hard worker and sacrificing mother who deprives herself for the sake of her children.

Today, she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to pay her children's school tuition fees.
Fatima hopes to expand her businesses more in the future to increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to pay her children's school tuition fees

loans.name: Rufina

texts.en:
Rufina is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Rufina is 51 years old now.

Rufina has a farming oyster business in the Philippines. Rufina requested a PHP 8000 loan amount through NWTF to buy materials needed such as, plastic, thread, etc..

Rufina has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Rufina would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy materials needed such as, plastic, threads for her oyster farm business.

loans.name: Liana

texts.en:
Liana is 38 years old and she lives with her family in Sevan city in the Gegharkunik region.

Liana has a vocational medical education and is a nurse. Liana works now simultaneously in two places- at the school and at the local polyclinics as a nurse. Liana’s husband is a school teacher. They have two school-aged children (a daughter and a son).

Liana is upset since their son has health problems and urgently they need money for the solution to that problem. Liana needs this loan of 700.000 Armenian drams very much to pay for her son’s medical treatment at the hospital and as soon as it is possible.

loans.use: to pay for her son’s medical treatment at the hospital and as soon as it is possible

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph used the previous loan to purchase beans, rice and maize for reselling at a profit. He is still involved in selling produce dealing in cereals like beans, rice and maize. His business is performing well and the profits from his business have been used to pay school fees for his children, meet the medical bills and service the loan.

He is faced with hardships of low customer turn over and high market price especially for ground nuts that lead to reduced income at the end of the month. Joseph is planning to construct a residential home for his family. He has asked for another loan to help him buy beans and rice for selling.

loans.use: to buy beans and rice for selling.

loans.name: Haydee Yamires

texts.es:
Haydee de 44 años de edad, estudió hasta tercer grado, su pareja se dedica a la agricultura y han procreado  3 hijos, uno de ellos vive aparte  porque está acompañado y los otros dos están en casa y estudian bachillerato.

Haydee se  dedica a la venta de productos lácteos, queso fresco, y leche, ella compra la leche  y luego la revende, de forma que le genera buenos ingresos para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del el hogar, se ha dedicado a este negocio desde hace unos 23 años, el trabajo lo realiza en su comunidad y lo hace de 4 a 5 horas diarias.


Ella solicita este crédito para comprar 300 pollos para crianza y el alimento para estos, ha recibido capacitaciones para el manejo de pollos y le gustaría ponerlo en práctica pues es una mujer emprendedora con muchos deseos de superación.

Ella sueña con ver a sus hijos como profesionales por eso los apoyará para que sigan estudiando,  ya que ella no tuvo la oportunidad y le ha sido difícil salir adelante por las escasas oportunidades de trabajo.
texts.en:
Haydee, 44 years old, studied until the third grade. Her partner works in agriculture and they have 3 children. One of them lives apart because he is married. The other two are at home and in high school. 

Hayden works selling dairy products - fresh cheese and milk. She buys milk and then resells it. In this way she generates good earnings to help her husband with the household costs. She has worked in this business for about 23 years. She does the work in her community for 4 to 5 hours each day.  

She requests this loan to buy 300 chickens to raise and the feed for them. She has received training in raising chickens and would like to put it into practice. She is an entrepreneurial woman with strong desires to succeed. 

She dreams of seeing her children as professionals and that is why she supports them in continuing to study. She did not have that opportunity and it has been difficult for her to get ahead with limited opportunities for work.

loans.use: to buy 300 chickens to raise and the feed for them.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en: Sarah is a married woman with two children living in Bundibugyo district.She deals in motor stare parts and does farming to generate extra income. She ventured into business purposely for personal development. She meets a hardship of expensive spare parts and high license fees which limits her expected returns. However, she looks at expanding her business into new market areas and also wishes to transform her business into wholesale. Sarah requests for a loan to buy more motor spare parts for selling.

loans.use: to buy more motor spare parts for selling.

loans.name: Ana Ruth

texts.es:
Ana, de 33 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, es madre soltera y tiene un hijo de 5 años de edad y viven en casa de sus padres.

Ana, tiene una venta de tortillas desde hace cinco años, pero también se dedica a la ganadería.

Ana, necesita el préstamo para comprar ganado e incrementar su ganadería.

Ana, sueña con que su hijo pueda ir a la escuela y pueda estudiar en la universidad y sea profesional.
texts.en:
Ana, 33, has a 9th grade education.  She is a single mother with a 5 year-old child.  They live in her parent's house.

Ana has had a tortilla business for 5 years, and she also works raising cattle.  She needs a loan to buy cattle so that she can increase her livestock business.  Ana dreams that her son will be able to go to school, study at the university, and become a professional.

loans.use: to buy cattle to expand her livestock business

loans.name: José Carlos

texts.es:
José de 73 años de edad,  no estudió, está casado y su pareja se dedica  los oficios domésticos,  tienen 8 hijos de los cuales solo 1 vive en casa y  los demás han formado sus propios hogares, en casa de José también viven dos nietos.


José se ha dedicado toda su vida a la agricultura y la crianza de ganado, su padre le enseñó la siembra de maíz, frijol, maicillo entre otros, se decidió por la agricultura porque no encontró otra forma de salir adelante y apoyar a su familia ya que eran muy numerosas y las necesidades también, aun así manifiesta que está contento en lo que hace pues se gana la vida de forma honrada, el trabajo lo tiene cerca de su casa y el horario de labores es de 5 a 6  horas al día.


Este crédito lo necesita para comprar una vaca, pues desea a provechar los residuos de la  cosecha agrícola que pronto sacará, el préstamo le ayudará a tener mejor el negocio de venta de leche y queso que le permite proveer otro ingreso a su familia. 

José sueña con seguir trabajando en lo que ha permitido salir adelante a su familia, la agricultura, aunque es una actividad difícil, espera seguir cosechando el maíz, frijol y otros.
texts.en:
José is 73 years old. He didn't study. He's married and his spouse is a homemaker. They have eight children, only one of whom lives with them. The other children have started their own families. José also lives with two grandchildren.

José has worked his entire life in farming and cattle raising. His father taught him how to grow corn, beans, sorghum and other crops. He decided to become a farmer because he couldn't find another way to get ahead and support the many needs of his very large family. Still, he reports that he's happy with his line of work, since he earns a living in an honorable manner. He works near his home and his work hours are about 5 to 6 hours a day.

He needs this loan in order to purchase a cow, since he wishes to make use of the excess produce from the harvest he's about to reap. The loan will help him to improve his milk and cheese sales business, which allows him to provide another source of income for his family.

José's dream is to keep on doing the work that has allowed him to get his family ahead, which is agriculture. Although it's hard work, he hopes to continue growing corn, beans and other crops.

loans.use: to purchase a cow so that he can make use of the excess produce from the harvest he's about to reap.

loans.name: Iman

texts.en:
Iman is a 40 year old Lebanese woman, married and the mother of three children. Her husband provides the main income in the family, and he has worked as a blacksmith on cars since 2000. His income is barely sufficient.

That’s why currently, she is requesting to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to pay her children's fees for school with the aim of insuring them a good education.

loans.use: to pay her children's school fees.

loans.name: Marwan

texts.en:
Marwan is a 48 year old Lebanese married man living with his wife and three young children, who are still attending school. He has his own business, he works in the tile field, and his wife owns a hardware store in her town.

Due to the hard financial situation, Marwan is requesting for a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l to pay his children’s school fees. His only purpose is to help them attain high educational levels.

loans.use: to pay his children’s school fees.

loans.name: Falasteen

texts.en:
Falasteen is 32-year-old woman from Jabalia City, married and mother to two little daughters.
Falasteen was living with her family in a small humble house, but during the latest war on Gaza, her house was destroyed completely. She had to rent a small apartment in the same area.

Recently Falasteen took a USD loan from Palestine for credit and Development (FATEN) in order to rebuild her old house. The loan will allow her to finalize the needed construction in a short time and return her family to their normal life. Falasteen appears in the photo.

loans.use: to rebuild her house which was destroyed in war

loans.name: Janneth

texts.en:
This young hardworking entrepreneur is Janneth from Calumpang, General Santos City, South Cotabato.

She is relaxed now that she has finished delivering loads of dried fish to the far City of Cotabato in Maguindanao. She is a dried fish dealer while her husband, Alan, is a fisherman. She has been in this business for eight years already, and she has already established contacts and retailers in Cotabato City. Sometimes her body aches as a result of long distance travel from her place to the delivery area, but she persists because she can sell her products there at a higher price and she can earn better profit.

She dreams to be a big time supplier of dried fish in Cotabato and nearby provinces someday, but for now she is applying for supplementary capital of PHP 20,000. She will use it to procure loads of dried fish that can supply more retailers than usual. She’s gradually expanding her network so she can achieve her future goal.

Janneth prays to God that her children will obtain their college degree and find stable jobs with the aid of her business. She is a dutiful member of CCT Credit Cooperative and meets with her co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to procure loads of dried fish that can supply more retailers than usual

loans.name: Epifania

texts.en:
Epifania is a married woman from Catigbian, Bohol. Her husband is a farmer and she helps her husband farm. They raised their family through farming for more than 16 years. They sell their harvested rice to have enough money for their expenses.

With this, Epifania and her husband want to improve their livelihood to sustain each day. They need funds to buy fertilizer to enhance the growth of their plants. Aside from this, they also want to buy piglets and feed as well. They plan to start a hog raising business that will certainly improve their earnings.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, piglets and feed.

loans.name: Sarah Jane

texts.en:
Sarah Jane is a single woman, 27 years old with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Sarah Jane has a buy and sell soft drinks business in the Philippines. Sarah Jane requested a PHP 7000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more boxes of soft drinks to sell.

Sarah Jane has been in this business for 4 years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more boxes of soft drinks to sell

loans.name: Brigida

texts.en:
Brigida is 60 years old and married with seven children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Brigida is borrowing PHP 5000 through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Brigida has been raising pigs for 10 years and also earns additional income from food vending.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Tomas

texts.es:
Tomas de 37 años de edad, es una persona muy dedicada a su familia, muy responsable y con buenas referencias, se dedica a la prestación de servicios de trasporte con un vehículo que es de su propiedad, también es propietario de una librería que es administrada por su esposa. Tomas creció con su padre que se dedicaba a la venta de granos básicos y a la agricultura y ganadería de esta forma adquirió experiencia y conocimientos.

Tomas tiene una experiencia de 8 años en prestación de servicios de trasporte y 5 años de ventas en librería, cuenta con mucha experiencia en realización de estas actividades que han sido aprendidas de su padre, a estas actividades se suma la ayuda de su esposa quien administra la librería, de esta manera generan ingresos económicos para solventar las obligaciones crediticias.  


El préstamo será utilizado para comprar cuadernos, lapiceros, lápices, folder, cartulinas, borradores, sacapuntas, etc. para la librería. 


Las metas que tiene para futuro son las de haber cancelado el crédito y adquirir uno nuevo para el mejoramiento de su casa.
texts.en:
Tomas, 37 years old, is a person who is very dedicated to his family, very responsible, and with good references. He works in the provision of transportation services with his own vehicle. He is also the owner of a bookstore that is managed by his wife. Tomas grew up with his father who worked in the sale of bulk grains, agriculture, and raising livestock. In this way, he acquired experience and knowledge.

Tomas has 8 years of experience in the provision of transportation services and 5 years of experience in bookstore sales. He has a lot of experience in the execution of these activities that he learned from his father. In these activities, he is joined by the help of his wife, who manages the bookstore. In this way, they generate economic income to settle their credit obligations.

The loan will be used to buy notebooks, mechanical pencils, pencils, folders, poster boards, erasers, pencil sharpeners, etc., for the bookstore.

His goals for the future are to have have paid off the loan and to acquire a new loan for the improvement of his house.

loans.use: to buy notebooks, mechanical pencils, folders, poster boards, erasers, pencil sharpeners, etc. for his bookstore.

loans.name: María Martina

texts.es:
María de 38 años de edad, se dedica a los oficios domésticos de su hogar todos los días. Creció con sus padres  quien se dedicaban al comercio de granos básicos y a la agricultura, es una mujer muy educada y trabajadora se caracteriza por  su alto compromiso con su familia, ella carece de estudios académicos  ya que la mayor parte de su tiempo lo dedicó a los quehaceres del hogar. 

 
María  tiene una experiencia de casi toda la vida en realizar ventas de granos básicos y trabajos de agricultura, ya que fue una actividad que aprendió de sus padres y es la que hoy en día se ha convertido en su principal fuente de ingresos 


El dinero será utilizado para pagar alquiler de maquinaria para preparar la cosecha de maíz, de esta manera tendrá un mejor ingreso el cual le servirá para cumplir con sus compromisos crediticos. 


Las metas que María tiene para un futuro son las de haber cancelado el crédito y adquirir otro para el mejoramiento de su casa y ampliar su negocio de granos básicos.
texts.en:
María, 38, works as a housewife every day. She grew up with her parents, who sold vegetables and worked in agriculture. She is a very polite and hardworking woman. She is known for being committed to her family. She did not study because she had to take care of the household chores.

María has worked almost all her life selling vegetables and in agriculture, something she learned from her parents, and became her main source of income.

She will use the loan to rent machinery to prepare her corn plantations. This will result in a higher income, which will help her to pay off her debts.

The goals María has set for the future are to pay off the loan and apply for a new one to make some home improvements and expand her business.

loans.use: to rent machinery to prepare the corn plantation.

loans.name: Abdullo

texts.en:
Abdullo is a good man from the Shahrituz district. He is 29 years old, married, and has two children. Abdullo loves and cares for his family. Since his children are still young Abdullo helps his wife with work around the house, and she helps him.

Abdullo has been farming since childhood and become a true expert in his field. He loves to tend and pamper the plants, and receives great satisfaction from the work. Right now he needs to buy fertilizer in order to prepare the ground where he will plant for fall harvest. He is worried that without fertilizer he will receive a poor harvest. Abdullo trusts in your help and hopes that his efforts will not be in vain.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Rania

texts.en:
Rania is a 41 year old, married, Lebanese woman. She lives with her husband and two school-aged children. Due to the bad circumstances, she decided to support her husband who works as a soldier. She opened a room in her house to prepare homemade foods and has been doing this for the last six years She has gained a fair number of customers so far.

Today she is requesting to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to purchase the needed quantity of food provisions. This way, she will be able to increase her revenues, and therefore improve her means.

She looks forward to expanding her work and opening a store.

loans.use: to purchase the needed quantity of food provisions for her cooking business.

loans.name: Asiljon

texts.en:
Asiljon is repeated client of IMON. He is a responsible and hardworking man. Asiljon is the careful father of 4 children. He lives with his family in a rural area of North Tajikistan and has been busy with animal husbandry. Asiljon feeds cows in a cowshed which is in his house. He buys cows, feeds them for some months and sells in a local market.

He has additional income from farming. He grows in a 5 ha land crops and potatoes and also he grows feed for cows. Asiljon is going to increase the number of cows he feeds so is asking for a loan of 6000 Somoni with this aim. He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy cows for increasing his working capital.

loans.name: Lilibeth

texts.en:
Lilibeth faces everyday challenges in her clothing business but she never stops dreaming of making the business prosper and hopes sooner or later be able to improve her way of living.

Her variety store is helping her provide for her family's daily needs. She wants to be successful through this trade and she automatically takes every opportunity that comes along her way. She already has taken her first loan through Kiva and repaid it successfully. So this time, she is asking again for your support to be able to raise the necessary amount which she needs to buy more supplies of doll shoes, sandals and additional ready-to-wear-clothes for her store. A PhP 25,000 worth of loan assistance will definitely increase her inventory, which means a bigger return on her investments.

Lilibeth wants to build a new branch if ever an opportunity allows her. She dreams to give her children a bright and better future through sustaining all their needs in school.

She meets every week with her *co-fellowship members to share stories of her work and to also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to increase her inventory of doll shoes, sandals and ready-to-wear-clothes for her business.	 .

loans.name: Meri

texts.en:
Meri is 27 years old and she lives with her parents in Sevan city in the Gegharkunik region.

Meri’s father is a doctor and her mother is a farmer. Meri has higher education; she graduated from Gavar State University with a degree in Political Science. Meri is a very clever and active young woman. She is employed and works as a secretary of court hearings. She likes her work and finds it very interesting.

Meri decided to surprise her parents with this Kiva loan of 500.000 Armenian drams. She wants to finally finish the repairs on their house, which is incomplete due to lack of finances.

loans.use: finish her house repairs.

loans.name: Jose Alfredo

texts.es:
Alfredo, de 32 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, está acompañado, tiene 4 hijos que están estudiando.

Alfredo, se dedica a la siembra de granos básicos y a la compra y venta de ganado, pero también en temporada de sandía también compra y vende; tiene más de 10 años de dedicarse a este tipo de comercio y su esposa se dedica al destazo; él decidió dedicarse a la ganadería porque un amigo lo incentivo a que se incorporara a este rubro y considera que le ha ido bien y le ha sido rentable.

Alfredo, necesita el préstamo para comprar ganado de repasto, porque se lo están vendiendo a un precio barato.

Alfredo, sueña con poder darle a su familia las mejores condiciones de vida y que sus hijos tengan una buena formación académica.
texts.en:
Alfredo is 32 years old, has a second grade education and is in a relationship. He has four children who are all in school.

Alfredo works growing basic grains and buying and selling cattle. In the watermelon season, he also buys and sells watermelons. He has been working in this type of business for more than ten years. His wife works as a butcher. He decided to work raising cattle because a friend encouraged him to do so and it went well for him and was profitable. Alfredo needs a loan to buy cattle for grazing because they are being sold to him at a good price.

Alfredo dreams of being able to provide his family with better living conditions and that his children may receive a good education.

loans.use: to buy cattle for grazing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy chicks, concentrated feed, and vitamins.

loans.name: Anesu Group

texts.en:
The illness of a loved one is a heavy burden to bear. In 2013, Angella’s father suffered from a serious medical condition which pushed the family to travel across Zimbabwe in search of assistance. After a series of false starts, a chance meeting with a woman who told her about Forever Living products gave her a new perspective. These products seemed to make a difference and made her also want to trade in the products and share their qualities with others.

Angella is a married mother of five children and is aged 38. She resides in a suburb of Harare. She began selling Forever Living products at a slow rate. She attended training offered by the product managers and read literature that gave her in-depth knowledge about the products. This elevated her confidence levels and she rose from the entry level to supervisor in a period of twelve months because of her good sales. The challenge now she is facing is that of capital shortages. Her demand is outweighing her potential to supply.

She is a member of Anesu group. This is a group of vibrant, cheerful and very hardworking women. The four members of Anesu are all involved in good income generating projects. The group joined Thrive and attended lessons gaining more business knowledge. Angella and her group members applied for a group loan. She wants to order boxes of products ranging from toothgel, health tonics, supplements and health shakes.

In future she is planning to buy a small car that will help her as her business requires her to be very mobile. She also has aspirations of one day traveling overseas as Forever Living gives incentives to their best performers in the form of overseas trips.

loans.use: to buy healthcare products ranging from toothgel, health tonics, supplements and health shakes.

loans.name: Dúo Jeremías 1 Group

texts.es: Dúo Jeremías 1 María de 59 años es comerciante y se dedica a la venta de refacciones y granizadas en el parqueo de buses de su comunidad desde hace más de 15 años, por las mañanas vende granizadas y por la tarde se dedica a la venta de refacciones. María solicita un crédito para invertir en su negocio pues las ventas suben en la temporada navideña y necesita abastecer sus productos comestibles para la elaboración de refacciones. María sueña con tener un mejor estilo de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Jeremías 1 duo.

María, 59, is a businesswoman who has been selling meals and slush juices at her community's bus station for more than fifteen years. She sells slush juices in the morning, and meals in the afternoon.

María is requesting a loan to invest in her business. Her sales increase during the Christmas season, and she needs to buy ingredients to make meals.

María dreams of improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to prepare meals and sell them.

loans.name: Homero

texts.es:
Homero con 37 años de edad,de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa propia de material rústico, junto a su cónyuge y sus hijos, en el distrito de Pomahuaca,provincia de Jaén,departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú. El cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de café, con una experiencia en el rubro de 15 años. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en labores agrícolas, aplicaciones e incorporaciones de productos fito sanitarios, fertilizantes, y mano de obra para su cosecha. De esta manera lo ayudará a la mejora tanto fisiológica, morfológica y productiva de su cultivo, así como también tener una cosecha oportuna, y por ende tendrá mayor producción, una mejor calidad de producto, por lo cuál no tendrá problemas en vender su producto.

Homero es socio recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa. Firma con su cónyuge.
texts.en:
Homero is 37 years old and is in a common-law marriage. He lives in his own house of rustic material, along with his spouse and his children, in the district of Pomahuaca, province of Jaen, department of Cajamarca, country of Peru. He has very good references, as many personal references as work references on the part of the inhabitants of the area. The inhabitants of this town mostly work in agriculture, commerce, and livestock.

He works in agriculture, specifically in the cultivation of coffee, with 15 years of experience in the industry. He will use the loan that he receives for farming, application and use of pesticides, fertilizers, and labor for his harvest. In this way, it will help him improve the function, appearance, and production of his crop, and he will also have an opportune harvest. Therefore, he will have better production, a better quality of product, because of which he will not have issues selling his product.

Homero is a recurring member of Edpyme Alternativa. He signed up with his wife.

loans.use: to farm and to apply and use pesticides, fertilizers, and labor for his harvest.
